loans.name: Mabaale Tukolenamani Sacco Group

texts.en:
Lawrence is a married Ugandan man living in Kagadi. He is 40 years old and has 8 children. He hopes to educate his children and build a better house.

Since 2000, despite price fluctuations, he has been selling produce and farming for better household income. Lawrence is requesting a loan to buy maize for selling. He is a member of the Mabaale Tukolenamani Group, where each member guarantees the other to get a loan since they don’t pledge securities.

loans.use: to buy maize for selling.

loans.name: Gertrude

texts.en:
Gertrude is a 52-year-old widowed hardworking woman living in Kagadi, Uganda. She has been keeping poultry for 25 years so far and does farming to earn a living. She hopes for business growth despite the hardship of  capital insufficiency. 

Gertrude is asking for a loan to buy more chicks to raise and sell.

The other person in the photo is the worker who helps her look after the poultry project.

loans.use: to buy more chicks to raise and sell.

loans.name: Delmy Del Carmen

texts.es:
Delmy de 30 años de edad,  vive en la zona costera junto a su pareja que se dedica a la pesca artesanal y tienen 3 hijos que dependen de ambos.

Delmy tiene 3 años dedicarse a comercializar mariscos, el producto lo compra a pescadores de la comunidad y lo vende a clientes que se trasladan desde la capital del país para comprárselo, los horarios para su negocio es por la mañana generalmente, su esposo a veces sale por la noches o en las mañanas a pescar para lo cual debe rentar una pequeña lancha.


Delmy necesita el crédito para comprar mariscos por mayoreo ya que de esta forma le sale mas barato y obtiene mejores ingresos al momento de venderlos. 

Su sueño es comprar su propio equipo de pesca, y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Delmy is 30 years old. She lives in the coastal area with her spouse who is an artisanal fisherman. They have three children who depend on both of them. 

Delmy has been selling seafood for 3 years. She buys the product from community fishermen and sells to customers who come from the country's capital to buy from her. Her schedule for this work is generally in the morning. Her husband goes out to fish at night or in the morning and to do that he has to rent a little boat. 

Delmy needs the loan to buy seafood wholesale since it is cheaper for her that way and she makes more profit when she sells it. Her dream is to buy her own fishing equipment and to get her children ahead.

loans.use: to buy seafood wholesale as it is cheaper that way and she makes more profit when she sells it.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Joseph, one of the most dedicated and hardworking farmers from Thika, Kenya. He has been doing agriculture for 5 years now. He makes money selling produce from his farm which includes milk, eggs, and crops. He enjoys plowing his farm and watering his plants. Crop diseases pose a big challenge for him and also poor productivity. 

Joseph is seeking a loan to buy farm inputs. Through the loan he plans to buy good quality seeds and fertilizer which will help in increasing soil fertility and productivity on his farm. Increased productivity will allow him to improve his quality of life and living standards. Through training from Juhudi Kilimo he has learned about the culture of saving and he plans to use the increased income in improving his farming. This loan will go a long way in permanently changing the life of Joseph and his family.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Adriana Estela

texts.es:
Adriana tiene 34 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, es madre de una niña de 6 años de edad la cual estudia en la escuela, está acompañada pero su pareja se encuentra fuera del país.  


Adriana se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, no tiene otras actividades a la cual se dedique, los ingresos provienen de la ayuda de su pareja.


Ella necesita el crédito para mejorar la vivienda, específicamente colocará el piso ya que anteriormente solo colocó el techo.

Ella sueña con ver su casa terminada para vivir de una forma más segura.
texts.en:
Adriana is a 34-year old woman who studied up to third grade. She has a 6-year old daughter who attends school, and a partner who lives abroad. Adriana is a housewife and receives income from her partner. 

She needs the loan to make improvements to her house, specifically to the floor (the ceiling was repaired in the past). Her dream is to see her house finished and to live more safely.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house, specifically to the floor.

loans.name: Rachna's Group

texts.en:
A resident from Preah Vihear province, Rachna is 24 years old and a mother of one kid. To secure the basic needs for her family, she does rice cropping and her husband works as a local school teacher. To supplement her family’s income, she raises pigs. 

For Rachna, this is her first loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now she is a leader of a group consisting of two borrowers. Racha will spend her entire loan on buying solar panels to generate electricity for her household. She hopes this loan can give her family a better life than before.

loans.use: To buy solar panels to generate electricity for her household.

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Tbeng Meanchey District

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y tienen 7 hijos de los cuales 4 estudian en una escuela cercana. 

Maritza se dedica a la elaboración de pan de forma artesanal y lo comercializa, decidieron dedicarse a esto debido a que vieron que le generaba buen margen de ganancias, su cuñada le enseñó este trabajo, en el cual se involucra el esposo de Maritza.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar ingredientes para hacer pan, como harina, levadura, manteca, dulce de panela, etc. 

Sus  planes se centran en que su negocio crezca y con ello sus condiciones de vida mejoren, además sueña con mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Maritza is a 32-year old woman who lives with her husband and 7 children, 4 of whom attend a school nearby. Maritza makes bread and sells it, a business that they realized could generate good income. She learned the business from her sister-in-law and Maritza's husband also gets involved. 

She needs to loan to buy ingredients to make the bread, such as flour, yeast, butter, brown sugar, etc. Her goal is to expand the business and improve her life conditions. She also dreams with making improvements to her house.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make the bread, such as flour, yeast, butter, brown sugar, etc.

loans.name: Gloria Eliana

texts.es:
La socia Gloria Eliana  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia hace paltos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gloria Eliana keeps working in food sales. She wants to get ahead thanks to these sales and makes dishes such as roasted chicken, soups, etc. Her dream is to expand the business. 

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, chicken and meat. She is happy to receive the loan and commits to repaying as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Ana Irma

texts.es:
Ana es una jovencita de 21 años de edad, es ama de casa y estudió hasta 5° grado, no pudo seguir estudiando porque decidió acompañarse y ahora es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 2, 6 y 3 años de edad, de los cuales solo uno se encuentra estudiando, pero dependen de ella los tres. Ana se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 2 años trabajo que lo aprendió por la misma necesidad que tiene y el compromiso de sacar a delante a sus tres hijos, para trasladarse a su lugar de trabajo Ana y su hermano que le ayuda viajan en bicicleta un kilometro todos los días, desempeñando su trabajo en el horario de 5:00 am a 11:00 am. El resto de la tarde se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa y a sus hijos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en la institución, es para comprar una vaca lechera, con la que espera tener un ingreso más para poder darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Ana es construir una vivienda digna, tener un terrenito agrícola y que sus tres hijos estudien mucho para que puedan llegar hacer unos profesionales y unas personas de bien para un futuro.
texts.en:
Ana, age 21, is a housewife.  She went to school through the fifth grade.  She was not able to continue with school because she decided to enter into a relationship.  She is now the single mother of three children, ages two, six, and three.  Only one of them goes to school.  However, all three children are dependent upon her.

Ana has been working in agriculture for two years.  She learned this work out of need and the commitment to get her three children ahead.  Ana and her brother, who helps her, travel by bicycle one kilometer every day in order to get to where she works.  Her work schedule is from 5:00 a.m. until 11:00 a.m.  She devotes the rest of the afternoon to the household chores and her children.

The loan that she is requesting from the institution is to buy a dairy cow.  She hopes to have another income from this in order to give her children a better quality of life.

Ana’s dream is to build a decent house, to have a piece of farmland, and for her three children to study a lot so that, in the future, they are able to become professionals and good people.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the school fee for her son who wants to continue his studies specializing in engineering.

loans.name: Anyela Lolita

texts.es:
Anyela Lolita tiene 19 años de edad, su estado civil es soltera, reside en el distrito de Buenos Aires, la vida en la comunidad es tranquila y su población se dedica a la crianza y comercio de ganado, y a la agricultura, dicha comunidad esta en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Anyela Lolita es a la venta de ropa, loza y productos de belleza, actividad que realiza desde hace más de 1 año y medio, ella reparte su ropa en toda la zona de Buenos Aires y entrega pedidos, contando con experiencia en el negocio y conocida en la zona, con muy buenas referencias personales y crediticias. Anyela Lolita necesita del credito para comprar una cantidad mayor de mercaderia(entre ropa y loza), para poder atender a todos sus pedidos, y de esta forma poder incrementar sus ingresos, sus ganancias aumentaran y por ende su calidad de vida mejorará.
texts.en:
Anyela Lolita is 19 years old. She is single and lives in the district of Buenos Aires. Life in the community is peaceful and its residents work raising and selling cattle and in agriculture. It is in the province of Morropón, Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru.

The activity that Anyela Lolita does is selling clothes, dishes and beauty products. She has done this activity for more than a year and a half. She delivers her clothes throughout the Buenos Aires area and fills orders. She has experience in the business and is known in the area with good personal and credit references.  

Anyela Lolita needs the loan to buy a larger quantity of merchandise (including clothes and dishes) so she can fill all of her orders. This way she can increase her income, her profits will increase, and therefore, her quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of merchandise (including clothes and dishes) to be able to fill of of her orders.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Alex is a hardworking man living in Kagadi-Uganda. He has been dealing in cattle trading since 1998, alongside farming and alcohol selling, to earn a living. 

He is challenged by lack of enough capital and competition from similar businessmen.  Alex intends to use the loan to buy cattle for selling.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for selling.

loans.name: Omaira

texts.es:
La señora Omaira es una mujer sensible y muy amorosa, es una gran compañera y guía de los niños que cuida en su propia guardería.

Trabaja todos los días sola desde hace 2 años y ya es muy reconocida en su barrio por el gran trabajo que realiza con sus niños.

Ella pide un apoyo económico para realizar la compra de algunas colchonetas para las dinámicas con sus niños, adicionalmente necesita realizar algunas mejoras locativas en su guardería para proteger sus niños y brindar seguridad a los padres.

En pocas palabras es una mujer que gracias a su gran corazón y vocación de servicio y cuidado, se merece todo lo mejor para progresar y salir adelante con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Omaira is a sensitive and loving woman, and a great partner and guide for the children that she looks after in her daycare center. She has worked on her own for 2 years and is very well-regarded in the neighborhood for the work she does with the kids. 

She is requesting a loan to buy some mats for the kids' activities, and to make some improvements in her space to guarantee additional safety and security for the children and parents. 

In a few words, she deserves all the best to improve and get ahead. She has a big heart and the vocation to serve and care for others.

loans.use: to buy mats and make improvements in her daycare center, so that additional safety and security can be provided to kids and parents.

loans.name: Santos Milagro

texts.es:
Santos tiene 34 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, solo aprendió a leer y escribir por medio de educación a adultos, vive con su pareja y sus 2 hijos. 

	Santos vende enchiladas, yuca frita, y otros productos de comida típica, negocio en el cual tiene más de 12 años, des pequeña aprendió a hacer los distintos productos típicos, el negocio lo tiene en su casa y realiza la venta por las tardes, 3 veces a la semana, su hija se involucra en la actividad. 


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar más mercadería para la elaboración de productos típicos como yuca, plátanos, etc. ya que se aproxima un evento de torneo de futbol en su comunidad, por lo cual debe estar preparada para vender y obtener más ganancias.

A futuro la cliente planea seguir trabajando de la misma manera y que su negocio vaya mejorando día con día para poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Santos is 34 years old. She didn't have a chance to go to school and only learned to read and write through adult education. She lives with her spouse and 2 children.  

Santos sells enchiladas, fried yucca and other traditional foods. She has had this business for more than 12 years. She learned to make different traditional foods when she was young. She has the business in her house and sells in the afternoons, 3 times a week. Her daughter is involved in the activity. 

She needs the loan to buy more merchandise to make the traditional foods such as yucca and plantains, because soon there will be a soccer tournament in her community and she has to be ready to sell and make more profit.  

In the future, she plans on doing the same work so her business will improve day to day and she can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to make traditional foods such as yucca, plantains, etc.

loans.name: Marlon Jonnathan

texts.es:
Marlon de 28 años de edad, es mecánico y es un hombre casado, por problemas económicos solo alcanzo a estudiar el 9° grado, ahora es padre de 3 hijos de 7, 2 y 7 meses de edad, de los cuales solo uno estudia, con Marlon vive su esposa y sus hijos por lo tanto son los que dependen de él. 

Marlon antes se dedicaba a la agricultura, pero desde hace 9 años se dedica al comercio (venta de CD), trabajo que lo aprendió por la misma necesidad económica en que vivía, para llegar a su trabajo Marlon camina tan solo 3 cuadras desempeñando un horario de 7:00 am a 5:00 pm.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para comprar más CD y para la compra del sistema eléctrico de su casa.

El sueño de Marlon es llegar a tener una vivienda propia, tener un terreno agrícola, que sus hijos estudien mucho para que sean unos profesionales y poder tener ingresos suficientes para pagar sin ninguna inconveniente el crédito adquirido con la institución.
texts.en:
Marlon is a 28-year old married man who works as a mechanic. Due to a lack of financial resources, he only studied up to 9th grade. He has 3 children, ages 7, 2 and 7 months, one of whom attends school. He lives with his wife and children, who depend on him. Marlon used to work in agriculture, but started to sell CDs 9 years ago. He works from 7am to 5pm and needs to walk only 3 blocks. 

He is requesting a loan to CREDICAMPO to buy more CDs as well as the electrical system of his house. Marlon's dream is to have his own house and a farming field, to see his children studying and becoming professionals, and to have enough income to repay the loan as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy CDs as well as the electrical system of his house.

loans.name: Mariseeri

texts.en:
Mariseeri is a 38-year-old Ugandan who is married to Juliet. They have 4 children aged 17, 14, 10 and 7, all of whom attend school.

Mariseeri is a business man who sells beer, soda, sugar and cooking oil. He is also engaged in cattle keeping and farming which gives him extra income. He has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to buy stock, specifically soda and beer, to sell to his customers.

He describes himself as hard-working and an honest person in business and in the community.

loans.use: to buy soda and beer to sell.

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en:
Winfred is a 30-year-old female Ugandan, married to Moses. They have two children and are residents of Kakindo.  She operates a retail shop which sells general merchandise and she also sells produce to supplement the retail shop.

She has applied for a loan of UGX 5,000,000 from UGAFODE to complete her house. She is going to buy iron sheets and timber. Finishing her house will help her to save the money that she spends on rent.

The major challenge in her business is the competition from other businessmen in the area.

loans.use: To buy iron sheets and timber

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine, burlap and leatherette for her company.

loans.name: Headmon

texts.en:
Headmon is a married male  with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. Headmon deals in coffee selling. He has been in that business for four years. He started the business with an aim of looking after his children. 

He needs a loan to buy coffee to sell. His dream is to expand his business. Headmon is a hardworking man; however, he is faced with the challenge of seasonality changes.

loans.use: to buy coffee to sell

loans.name: Anzhela

texts.en:
Anzhela lives in Artashat with her parents and sister. Her parents are doctors, so she also decided to choose the medical field. 

She is a pharmacist. She runs a small pharmacy in the center of Artashat town. Her advice to clients is very helpful for them, so she has many loyal clients in the town. 

The requested loan of USD 3000 is very important for Anzhela and her pharmacy to purchase showcases and medicine needed for the pharmacy. She will be very grateful to lenders for their support of her loan.

loans.use: to pay for  showcases and medicine for thepharmacy

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a 50-year-old Ugandan, married to Justine. They have six children with two who attend school.

Godfrey is a business man who sells dresses, trousers, shoes, etc., but he also does farming as side income.

He has applied for a loan of UGX 4,000,000 from UGAFODE, which he has promised to repay very well since he is going to invest it in the sale of clothes and shoes.

His plans for the future include expanding his business and buying land to start cattle keeping.

loans.use: To buy clothes and shoes for sale

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en:
Warlita is 48 years old from Lasilat, Baggao, Cagayan. She is married with five children. The family earns an income from farming and selling vegetables. Their small earnings are not sufficient to send their children to school, especially Anastacio who is taking up Consumer Electronics Servicing. 

He is aiming to get a job right after he graduates so he can help elevate their family’s standard of living. He knows that they can’t do it alone that’s why they want to avail themselves of an educational loan of PHP 10,000 which will be used to pay his tuition fees.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fees.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy was previously granted a 20,000 PHP loan which she used to purchase more quantities and varieties for her sari-sari store (variety store) which helped meet her personal, household, and business needs. She also has her own tailoring business. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to purchase a sewing machine and textiles for her tailoring business. This additional business sold will yield more income. More income will really help  her sustain their daily household needs and will further grow her business. She is looking forward to a more fruitful business this year.

Mercy is positive that her business will continue to flourish and dreams of having a happy family. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To purchase an additional sewing machine and fabrics

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion has faithfully paid back her previous loan which she used for her business. She has been operating her own “sari-sari” (variety) store for years which has good earnings. Having a bigger family requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her three children. She has to work hard, with the determination of having a higher income, to provide her children with a better education. 

To improve sales, Salvacion would like to apply for a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. With 25,000 PHP, she could purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Salvacion hopes to maintain a growing income from her variety store. She also dreams of making improvements to her family's present financial situation. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Alba de 33 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta 9° grado no siguió estudiando por falta de un instituto en la comunidad donde ella vivía, es madre soltera de 2 hijas que se encuentran estudiando, Alba vive con sus dos hijas y su mamá son las que depende de ella. Alba tiene una tienda en donde trabaja desde hace 10 años, trabajo que lo aprendió debido a la pobreza en que vivían, ahora trabaja mucho mas para sacar adelante a sus hijas ya que solo dependen de ella, su horario es de 7:30 am a 6:00 pm.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para invertir en productos de la canasta básica para surtir más su negocio, comprando arroz, azucar, café, fosforos, gas propano, condimentos, embutidos, lácteos, etc y así poder ofrecer una mejor variedad a los clientes los cuales se sentirán satisfechos de los productos.

El sueño de Alba es que sus hijas estudien, para que sean una personas de bien y llegar a tener una casa propia, ya que en la que vive esta alquilando.
texts.en:
Alba is 33 years old and is a housewife.  She attended school up to the 9th grade.  She didn’t continue her studies because of a lack of an educational institution in the community where she lived.  She is a single mother of 2 daughters who are attending school.  Alba lives with her two daughters and her mother who depend on her.  Alba has a store where she has worked for 10 years, work that she learned due to the poverty in which they were living.  Now she works a lot more in order to help her daughters get ahead since they depend completely on her.  Her schedule is from 7:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

The loan that she is requesting from CrediCampo is to invest in some basic staples in order to better stock her business, buying rice, sugar, coffee, matches, propane gas, condiments, lunch meats, dairy products, etc., and in this way be able to offer a greater variety to customers who will feel satisfied with the products. 

Alba’s dream is that her daughters study so that they can become good people and so that she can come to have her own house as she is renting the one in which she lives.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, coffee, matches, propane gas, condiments, lunch meats, dairy products, etc. in order to stock her store.

loans.name: Jostus

texts.en: Jostus is a 48-year-old male who is married with nine children living in Kasese, Uganda. He operates a shop selling new clothes and he earns additional income from the sale of cassava flour, and from a motorcycle transport business. He has been in business for two years as he hopes to generate income for his family. He needs the loan to purchase more new dresses, shirts, shoes, trousers and other items to sell.

loans.use: to buy new dresses, shirts, shoes, trousers and other items to sell

loans.name: Channak's Group

texts.en:
Channak is a 36-year-old woman residing in Kampong Cham province. She is a mother of four children, three of whom are in school and one is too young for schooling. 

She earns a decent income to support her family via selling grocery items. This is the sixth cycles for Channak with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has repaid her past loans completely. 

Now she leads a group of two to get a new loan.  As a group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy solar panels. She hopes that this purchase will help her family to have electricity for using.

loans.use: To buy solar panels.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 52-year-old single Ugandan lady, living in Kagadi with eight children and all attend school. 

She has been operating a bar and retail shop since 1996 to improve her daily income. She hopes to improve her standards of living, though defaulters and competition are her major threats. Mary intends to use a loan to buy general merchandise like eggs and bread for selling.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like eggs and bread  for selling.

loans.name: Nen

texts.en: Nen is a 30-year-old fish seller and a married woman with three children. She has been in this business since 2012. Her husband is 34, a crane driver. One of her children is a student. They all live in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Together, they can earn approximately $31.66 per day. Now Nen would like to request a loan to buy wood to build a new house. This loan will help her and her family live in better conditions. In the future, she is going to expand her business, fill the soil around the house and support her children to go to university.

loans.use: to buy wood to build a new house

loans.name: Sveta

texts.en:
Sveta lives in Norashen village with her in-laws, husband, and 5-year-old daughter.  She and her husband are involved in the frozen fruit business. In their own orchard, they grow different kinds of fruit trees, keep the produce in two freezers that they currently have, and sell it during the winter. 

Realizing how great is their current harvest of fruits, Sveta needs some funds to be able to purchase three more freezers for their business and also hire workers for gathering the harvest. This loan will be a huge support for their family business, and Sveta hopes for lenders' goodwill. 

As this is Sveta's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who have not had access to credit products before because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for three freezers and the workforce for gathering the harvest

loans.name: Phalla

texts.en:
Phalla is a married woman with four children. She produces alcohol for sale and she has been doing this since 2005. Her husband is 34. He has a bass box set and removable open wedding shed for rent. One of her children is a garment-factory worker and the three others are students. They all live Takeo Province, Cambodia. Together, they can earn approximately $24 per day. 

Now Phalla would like to request a loan to buy a motor vehicle to use in the family and for business. This loan will help her family reduce traveling and transportation expenses. In the future, she is going to expand her husband's rent service, pave around the house and support her children to go to university.

loans.use: to buy a motor vehicle to use in the family and for business.

loans.name: Azamat

texts.en:
Azamat comes from a rural area; he is very hardworking man. Azamat is married, and has four children. His children are non-adults. 

Eght years ago he began a business with animal husbandry. This kind of business is the main business in his region. Many local people are busy with this business. Azamat feeds cows and sheep. He feeds 10 cows and 4 sheep now. He has a cowshed in his house. His wife and children help him with feeding cattle. Azamat sells cattle in a local market. 

He is going to increase the number of sheep he feeds. He is asking for a loan of 10,000 Somoni to buy 10 sheep. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy 10 sheep

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is 62 years old and is a widow.

Belinda is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Belinda requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Belinda has been raising pigs for seven years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Belinda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en:
Andrea is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Andrea is 32 years old and has two children who are in school.

Andrea has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Andrea requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of clothing to sell.

Andrea has been in this business for two years. In the future, Andrea would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Justus is a hardworking Ugandan man, aged 49 years, with nine children. He lives in Kagadi where he has been operating a butchery selling cattle and pigs and practicing commercial agriculture for development since 2002 . 

He has the personal goals of opening up a retail shop for the wife and educating his children at university. Justus is requesting a loan to buy pigs and cattle for selling in his butcher shop.

loans.use: to buy pigs and cattle for selling in his butcher shop.

loans.name: Waheeda

texts.en:
Waheeda is 26, married, and blessed with a daughter and a son. She is a young and caring housewife. 

Her husband is a mechanic and owns a motorcycle repair workshop. He has been in this business for over five years. He is a loving father and a very hardworking person. Most of his time is spent on his workshop repairing motor vehicles. 

He wants to buy more items used frequently at his workshop for repairs. Therefore Waheeda has requested a loan to help her husband purchase these items and increase his earnings. She is thankful to BRAC and Kiva for their assistance.

loans.use: To help her husband buy items for his motor vehicle workshop

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa is an experienced farmer from the village of Metsamor in Armavir region. She lives with her husband and son and is engaged in cultivation of tomatoes and greens in a greenhouse. Larisa's husband sells the agricultural products in the local market. 

She currently needs to expand her farming activities a little bit in order to cover her family's daily costs more effectively. She particularly wants to purchase a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse, tomato seeds and fertilizer. A loan of USD 1,000 will be a big support to this hard-working woman, and will help her greatly. Larisa will be very grateful to all the lenders for their goodwill and support in gathering the needed amount of loan to develop her agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse, tomato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Evaline

texts.en:
Evaline is a 32-year-old lady, single, and very hardworking. She has been in the tailoring business, whereby she designs and makes dresses and has been selling to her customers for the last seven years and making a monthly profit of Kenya shillings 20,000. 

She has applied for her first loan with VisionFund Kenya, which she plans to use to purchase more fabric materials for use in her business. 

Evaline plans to use the anticipated income to expand her business; she hopes to have a bright future with a lot of success.

loans.use: to buy more fabric material

loans.name: Guillermo De Jesús

texts.es:
Guillermo es un joven de 25 años de edad, es comerciante y es un hombre soltero, por problemas económicos él solo alcanzo a estudiar hasta 7° grado, luego se esmero por trabajar para ayudar en los gastos de la casa, vive con su mamá quien depende de él y también vive con su hermano. Guillermo se dedica al comercio desde hace 3 años y medio, trabajo que lo aprendió por la misma necesidad en que vivía, el negocio lo tiene en su casa por lo tanto no viaja, para administrarlo en algunos momentos su madre también le ayuda en la atención del negocio mientras que él a veces trabaja en el cultivo. Su horario es de 6:00 am a 7:30 pm. Todos los días.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en la institución, es para invertir en el negocio se comprara aceite, azúcar, frijol, arroz, concentrado, café, lejía, jabón, rinso, champo etc. para surtir mas su negocio y así poder ofrecer una mejor variedad a los clientes,los cuales se sentirán satisfechos de los productos y con eso Guillermo espera tener un mayor ingreso para tener una mejor calidad de vida él y su mamá.

Guillermo sueña con tener un carro, mejorar su vivienda y llegar a tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a 25-year-old, single young man who is a shopkeeper.  Because of financial problems he was only able to attend school up to the 7th grade and then he took great pains to work in order to help with the household expenses.  He lives with his mother who depends on him and he also lives with his brother.  Guillermo has worked in his store for 3 ½ years, work that he learned because of that same poverty in which he was living.  He has the business in his house and therefore he doesn’t travel.  Sometimes his mother also helps him with managing the business by attending to it while he sometimes works in the fields.  His schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 7:30 p.m every day.

The loan that he is requesting from the institution is to invest in the business.  He will purchase oil, sugar, beans, rice, animal feed, coffee, bleach, soap, detergent, shampoo, etc. in order to better stock his business and in this way be able to offer a greater variety to his customers who will feel satisfied with the products.  With that Guillermo hopes to have a higher income in order to have a better quality of life for himself and for his mother. 

Guillermo dreams of having a car, improving his home and having a larger business.

loans.use: to purchase oil, sugar, beans, rice, animal feed, coffee, bleach, soap, detergent, shampoo, etc., in order to better stock his business.

loans.name: Nyaruhanda Tulihamwe Group

texts.en:
Ronald is a hard-working married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in produce, selling coffee, beans and maize as his main source of income though he also practices farming where he earns an extra income. He started this business to sustain his family and have better standards of living. He faces challenges of competition, price fluctuations and defaulters. He has a vision of owning a big produce store and educating his children.

He is requesting a loan to buy more coffee, beans and maize to sell. He is a member of Nyaruhanda Tulihamwe Group where each member guarantees the other.

loans.use: to buy more coffee, beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Chory

texts.en: Chory is a kind man. He lives in a rural area. Chory has been busy with animal husbandry more than 15 years. He feeds cows and sheep. Chory’s sons help him with feeding cattle. He has 3 sons. His wife also helps him with managing business. Chory now feeds 3 cows, 6 sheep and 4 goats. Chory sells cattle in a local market. His elder son is a migrant in Russia and he sends money periodically but it is still not enough for living. So, Chory is going to increase the number of sheep he feeds and in this way develop business and maximize profit. He is asking for a loan 5,000 somoni to buy 5 sheep. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy 5 sheep for increasing the number of cattle he feeds

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 42-year-old Ugandan resident of Kyabasali.  He is married and has 5 children, ages between 24 and 11. He is a farmer, and he grows mostly pineapples and coffee, but he also deals in produce during the harvest seasons.

He has applied for a loan of 700,000 to buy beans and maize.  

His dream is to buy more land. Francis hopes to buy a tractor in the near future to assist him in farming. His major challenge is the weather changes.

loans.use: To buy beans and maize

loans.name: Nadara

texts.en:
Nadara is a 23-year-old married woman. For about 10 years she is been doing hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. In this way she will be able to cater more customers consistently. She is hopeful that she will get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. Nadara dreams of her children's bright future. She is very much thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Manisuri

texts.en:
Manusuri is a 38-year-old Ugandan and married to Lukiya with 19 children. Manisuri is a farmer who grows crops such as maize and beans and rides a motorcycle.

Manusuri has applied for a loan of 1,800,000 UGX to buy a motorcycle to assist him in activities of agriculture in order to generate more income. His plans for the future are to buy a tractor which will help him to increase his productivity and better living standards for his family.

Manusuri thanks Kiva and UGAFODE for the job well done.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to assist him in agriculture

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
La socia Albertina se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Albertina continues working in the restaurant business.  She makes different dishes like baked chicken, soups and pan-seared meat dishes.  She works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  She has 8 years in this business and it is going very well for her.  Having a restaurant has been her dream.  

Albertina is requesting the loan to purchase cooking products like rice, vegetables and chicken.  She is happy about the loan and she is committed to making her installment payments.

loans.use: to purchase cooking products such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Santos Marcial

texts.es:
Santos Marcial tiene 52 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene una hija a su cargo, vive en casa propia,en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotun, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Santos Marcial se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, hace 6 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, él solicita préstamo para activo fijo, pues desea comprar una laptop para su hija que está estudiando, y de esta manera facilitar el aprendizaje y ayuda tecnológica que esta necesita, mejorando su calidad de vida estudiantil.
texts.en:
Santos Marcial is 52 years old and has one dependent daughter. He lives in his own house in the rural part of the District of Oyotun, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region on the North Coast of Peru.

Santos Marcial has been working raising and selling livestock for the last 6 years. His business is located behind his house. He is requesting a loan for a fixed asset, as he wants to buy a computer for his daughter who is studying. This will facilitate her learning and provide technical assistance as needed, improving her quality of life as a student.

loans.use: to buy a laptop for her daughter's studies.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es:
Alfonso tiene 45 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Alfonso se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, con más de 8 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que está ubicado en la parte posterior de domicilio, Alfonso solicita préstamo para compra de más animales, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; cliente piensa incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender las diversas gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona, y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos, mejorar sus ganancias y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Alfonso is 45 years old, is married, and has two children.  He lives with his family in a rural zone in the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Perú.

Alfonso works raising and selling animals.  He has more than 8 years of experience in the business, which is located in the back of his home.  He is asking for a loan in order to purchase more animals.  This investment will help him have better variety and productivity with regard to his livestock, which will be great for business.  He hopes to increase his livestock in order to serve diverse preferences and needs among customers in the area, and in this way increase his income, improve his earnings, and in that way improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quanitity of livestock in order to diversify his business.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a teacher. She lives with her husband and her son in Tegh village of Syunik region. Besides her work in the local village school, Susan is also involved in farming. She keeps cows, calves, sheep, pigs, piglets, hens and turkeys. Susan's husband sells the gathered agricultural products locally, thus earns income for the family's living. 

The requested loan of 2,500 USD is very important for Susan's farm to purchase 3 sows and forage for feeding them. She hopes for lenders' support and goodwill in collecting the needed amount of the loan.

loans.use: to pay for 3 sows and forage for feeding them

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine is an experienced agronomist from Aknaghbyur village of the Tavush region. She lives with her husband, mother-in-law and two little children (four-year-old daughter and newborn son). To be able to take care of their basic needs, Lusine and her husband breed hens and piglets, cultivate wheat and corn and some fruits (plums, cherry, grapes and apples). Horticulture is the only source of income for Lusine. 

To be able to continue her agribusiness, Lusine needs to make some investments. A loan of $1,150 (USD) will enable her to purchase three pigs, expand the barn and purchase fertilizer for land cultivation. Lusine will be very thankful to all the lenders for their good will in helping her to sustain her agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase three pigs, expand the barn and purchase fertilizer for land cultivation

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet, who is 40 years old, is married with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. She owns a butcher shop and has been in that business for ten years. She also runs a retail shop and farms for additional income. 

Juliet has a dream of educating her children for a bright future. Juliet is a hardworking woman who is asking for support to enable her business to grow. She will use the loan to buy bulls for slaughtering.

loans.use: to buy bulls for slaughtering.

loans.name: Marleny Yamileth

texts.es:
Marleny tiene 36 años de edad, estudió hasta el bachillerato, ahora tiene dos hijos que procreó en su relación anterior, su actual pareja se dedica a la agricultura.


Marleny se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, además siempre que puede le ayuda a su pareja en los trabajos agrícolas.


Este crédito lo necesita para mejorar su vivienda ya que una parte del techo está dañado, comprará madera y tejas, de esta forma estará más segura en los momentos de lluvias.


Sus planes son seguir mejorando su casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Marleny, 36 years old, completed high school. Now, she has 2 children born of a previous marriage.  Her present husband is a farmer.

Marleny devotes herself to household tasks, but she always helps her husband with his agricultural work when she can.

This loan is needed to make improvements on her house, since a part of the roof is damaged. She will purchase lumber and tiles and as a result, the home will be more secure when it rains. 

Marleny's plans are to continue improving her house and to help her children become professionals.

loans.use: to make home improvements since a portion of the roof is damaged, requiring lumber and tiles.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of 4 children. In order to support her husband in taking care of the family, she began the business of selling milk. She is known in her town for providing good quality milk. She owns 2 buffalo. Nasreen is happily supporting her family with the income generated. She is in her 6th loan cycle. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo. She is hopeful that an increase in milk production will help her in generating more income.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Chikim B Group

texts.en:
The featured borrower Lhingcha is a 30-year-old single woman. She believes that women are the backbone of the family in every society and play a very important role in the family. She takes great responsibilities in her household in both finances and housework. She looks after her aged parents as well as supporting her nieces and nephews for their school fees every month by running a retail clothing shop in the market. Her parents who were once farmers are now weak physically and have become dependent as they cannot work anymore in the field like before. 

She supports her family with the money she makes from her shop and is the main source of income for the family. Her business starts at 10 o'clock in the morning till five in the evening. This will be her second loan cycle. The first loan cycle was used to expand and buy inventory for the shop. Being a practical woman she has a good record of repaying the amount borrowed. 

"It was very helpful in improving my business" she said and said she was thankful to Kiva. She wants to buy more inventory to sell and has taken a second loan. It will be used wisely in her business endeavour and to increase her earnings.

loans.use: To buy inventory including clothes and trousers of different designs.

loans.name: Ruqiya

texts.en:
Ruqiya is a 33-year-old married woman. For the past twelve years she has been selling spices which are used in cooking food with the support of her husband. She purchases spices in bulk from the wholesale market and then packs them in various sizes. Her husband assists her by selling them door-to-door. She has become famous by providing good quality spices in her locality and earns enough to have a decent life. 

She needs to earn more to bear the daily expenditures of her family members. For this reason she requested for a loan of 60,000 PKR to buy a stock of salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantities. She is in her 7th loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize her earned profit on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a stock of salt, red chilies, black pepper and turmeric in large quantities.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated a business selling animals. She has been doing it for many years and has become well-known in her locality. She also sells milk to generate extra amounts of income. 

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales which will ultimately help in generating more income for her. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia Margarita se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas y tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de granos secos, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias y mercados, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Margarita continues to work at her business raising small animals like guinea pigs and chickens. She also continues to work at her business selling dry grains. The member fattens and nurtures the animals and sells them at the different markets. She works from 8am until 6 pm and has been in this business for 4 years. Things are going well for her. Her dream is to have a stall where she can sell the animals. Margarita is pleased with the loan and promises to comply with the payment of her installments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Barnogul

texts.en:
Barnogul is 38 years old, married with three children. Being a responsible mother, Barnogul works hard every day to generate income so that she can cover her daily costs and send some of her children to school. 

She is dedicated to the farming business, growing rice on her own land. In order to contribute to improving her family's living standards, she has worked hard from early morning until late evening for ten years.

Barnogul would like to develop her business, which is why she is asking for a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and seeds for new planting season. She hopes that Kiva lenders won’t reject her loan and she thanks lenders in advance for their generosity.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and seeds for new planting season

loans.name: Hranush

texts.en:
Hranush is an experienced farmer from the village of Dzoravand. She lives with her husband and 16-year-old son. The latter helps her a lot in everyday farming activities. Hranush breeds livestock: cows, calves and hens. She also cultivates corn, haricots, cabbage, cucumber, potatoes and grass. Hranush has an established agribusiness. Farming is the only source of income for the family. 

As the autumn is coming, she needs to obtain a supply of forage for the livestock. A loan of USD 3,000 will help her greatly by enabling her to pay for forage for the livestock and a calf. The lenders' support will be highly appreciated, and will help this hard-working woman to continue her agribusiness in a sustainable way.

loans.use: to pay for forage for the livestock and a calf.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is a married woman. She is a responsible mother of 3 children and is responsible for providing them with the basic necessities of life. She has been helping in her husband's business of furniture-making. The man shown in the photo is Rukhsana’s husband. They have been making furniture together for many years. Over time they have become famous for providing good quality furniture in her community. 

In order to purchase good quality wood with packs of polish and nails in larger quantities, she applied for a loan of 40,000 Pakistan Rupees (PKR) from Kashf Foundation. In this way they will be able to cater to more customers without delay which ultimately helps in bringing more cash home. She dreams of providing a bright and prosperous future to her children.

loans.use: to purchase good quality wood, packs of polish and nails in larger quantities.

loans.name: Saffia

texts.en:
Saffia is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of three. She has been running a business selling cloth for many years. She purchases a variety of cloth from the main city and then sells it to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. 

Saffia requested a loan of PKR 50,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different cloth for the new season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she will be able to earn more income through greater sales. 

Saffia hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of providing a better standard of living for her family through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different cloth for the new season

loans.name: Queen Group

texts.en:
This is a group called Queen.  They motivate and support one another financially and economically and try to supplement their family income. They all live in Saikul in Manipur.

Nengneihoi is the featured profile member pictured with her hand raised. She is 23 years old and a mother to a one and half year old kid. Her husband is a taxi driver by profession and does not have regular income. As his income is not sufficient to manage the family, she opened a variety store near her house in order to supplement the family income. 

As per Nengneihoi, more customers flock in during evening and night time. However, due to the scarcity of the electric supply, she could not run the business smoothly or open till 8 pm. Therefore she wishes to avail a solar loan to buy a 40 watt mini-solar home lighting to be installed in her variety store. This will help in increasing her income and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy a solar home lighting system to be installed in her variety store.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
a socia Judith se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Judith continues with her business selling clothing. She sells pants, blouses and polo shirts. She has been in the business for several years and things are going well for her. Her dream is to have her own store. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes, polo shirts, sweaters and blouses. She is happy to have the loan and promises to comply with the instalments of her loan.

loans.use: to buy shoes, polo shirts, sweaters and blouses.

loans.name: Noemi Elizabeth

texts.es:
Noemi tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos, logró culminar sus estudios de educación básica (9 grado), actualmente es comerciante y tiene su propio negocio. 

Noemi tiene 3 años de estar en el negocio de la venta de ropa, anteriormente tenía una tienda pero por problemas de delincuencia se fue a otro lugar a realiza la actividad, su hijo le ayuda en el negocio.   

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar ropa para el negocio y también para comprar un carretón para vender refrescos y panes para que su hijo le de uso y poder generar más ingresos a la familia.  


Sus planes son tener un negocio más grande en un puesto propio ya que por el momento vende a la orilla de la calle, y que funcione la venta de refrescos.
texts.en:
Noemi, age 47, is the single mother of two children. She managed to complete basic studies (through ninth grade), and she is currently a salesperson who owns her own business.

Noemi has been in the business of selling clothes for three years now. She used to have a store, but for reasons of late payments, she had to move to a new location to perform her sales. Her son helps her in the business.

She needs this loan to buy clothing for her business. She also plans to buy a large cart from which she'll sell soft drinks and bread. Her son will use this and thus generate greater income for the family.

Her plans include having a larger business run from a stand of her own, since she's selling on the side of the street now, and that the new business selling soft drinks works well.

loans.use: buy clothing for one business and buy a cart to sell soft drinks and breads

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Kousar, aged 43, is a very enthusiastic person who has been successfully running a shop-keeping business for 19 months. She offers a variety of daily use products and has a good client base. 

In order to avoid shortages, Kousar needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand. 

Kousar has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices, etc. In this way, she will be able to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices, etc.

loans.name: Peace Group

texts.en:
Vahkim is a caring and loving mother who thrives to give her children the best facility as per her capacity. She lives with her five children and husband in a village where there is a scarcity of power supply. 

Her husband's occupation is a cultivator, while Vahkim is a vegetable vendor. She says the earnings she gets are used for her children’s education and the of the little saving she had, she will use that amount to repay back the loan. She always wanted her children to get good education and be excelling in their studies. 

She wanted to avail a solar home lighting loan for her children for a better study environment. As the power supply is irregular and unreliable in the village, a 40 watt mini-solar home lighting system which will light up four light bulbs for 12 hours a day, which can help her children to study for longer hours. She believes that, as the lighting products are bright, they will provide conducive luminance for reading.

loans.use: to buy a 40 watt mini-solar home lighting system

loans.name: Darico

texts.es:
Darico tiene 28 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 03 hijos dependientes, vive con sus hijos y su conyugue, en el caserío San Juan de Chorrillos en el distrito de Callayuc, provincia y región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Darico se dedica a la destilación de aguardiente, hace más de 10 años. Darico necesita préstamo para el mantenimiento y ampliación de áreas de caña, ya que con la ampliación y mantenimiento de su cultivo podrá tener mayor cantidad de materia prima para la destilación de aguardiente, y de esta forma podrá obtener mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Darico, age 28, lives with his partner and his three dependent children in the neighborhood of San Juan de Chorrillos in the Callayuc district, part of the province and region of Cajamarca along the northern coast of Peru.

Darico is in the business of distilling aguardiente, or "firewater," a type of liquor made from sugarcane. He's been doing this for more than ten years. He needs this loan to maintain and expand his plots of sugarcane. Doing so will give him a greater quantity of raw materials for his aguardiente distillation. That way, he'll earn greater income and greater profit, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: maintain and expand his sugarcane production

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda tiene 40 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa familiar en una comunidad tranquila, donde se respira mucho de la naturaleza, esta comunidad esta ubicada en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, region Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Nilda se dedica a las actividad de venta de abarrotes, con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, el cual se ubica en su domicilio, ella solicita préstamo para comrpa de mercaderia, dicha inversión le servirá para poder surtir su tienda con un mejor y mayor stock de productos y poder atender a todas las necesidades de su público consumidor, aumentando sus ventas de esta manera, y por consiguiente sus ganancias, mejorando también su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nilda, age 40, is single and lives in her family's home in a quiet community. It's a place where you can really soak in Nature, located in the district of Lagunas in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, along the northern coast of Peru.

Nilda runs a small grocery store out of her home, as she has for more than three years. She is requesting this loan so that she can more merchandise. This will help her stock a greater and a better range of products thus meeting all the needs of her customers. Increasing sales in this way, and thus increasing her income, will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: stock her store and meet her customers' needs.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma is a twenty-six-year-old hard-working married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in produce-selling and also practices motorcycle transport where he earns an extra income. He started this business to have a better standard of living. He faces challenges of competition, price fluctuation, and high rate of taxation. He has a vision of becoming a leading produce seller and haing educated children.


Juma is requesting a loan to buy more rice, beans, and millet to sell.

loans.use: to buy more rice, beans, and millet to sell

loans.name: Esterfilia

texts.es:
Esterfila tiene 41 años de edad, su estado civil es conviviente, reside en el distrito de Buenos Aires, junto a sus dos menores hijos desde hace más de 15 años, la vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la crianza y comercio de ganado,ademas de la agricultura; dicha comunidad esta ubica en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad a la que se dedica Esterfila es a la crianza y venta de cerdos en su domicilio, contando con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, con muy buenas referencias en la zona donde vive tanto laborales como personales; el destino del crédito será para la mejora de su vivienda(contruir 2 habitaciones más), y asi poder ofrecerle a su familia un lugar más comodo, abrigador y seguro donde vivir, mejorando de esta la calidad de vida de todos ellos incluyendo la suya.
texts.en:
Esterfila is 41 years old and is in a common-law relationship. She has lived in the district of Buenos Aires, together with her two children for more than 15 years. Life in this community is quiet and she works raising and selling livestock as well as farming. This community is located in the province of Morropón, Piura region, on the north coast of Peru.

Esterfila's business is raising and selling pigs at her home. She has more than 5 years experience in the field and has excellent references in her area both as to her personal and work habits. The loan will be used to improve her house, building two more rooms, so she can provide a more comfortable place for her family, warm and safe to live in. This will improve the quality of living for all of them, including herself.

loans.use: to improve her house, adding on two more rooms.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: Luis Miguel,  tiene la edad de 18años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de una vaca  que tenga buenas características para la producción de leche y que se adapte bien a las condiciones de clima y tipo de pasto de la zona  y que pueda tener una buena cría para el desarrollo y así tener un mejor ingreso en la producción de leche y la venta de terneros  para engordar, con este ingresos económicos  es para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de materiales para hacer mejoras en la propiedad, además de aumentar la cantidad y calidad de las vacas. Con esta compra pretende hacer más. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos Estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores y la tasa de interés mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis Miguel, age 18, is single and lives with his parents and brothers and sisters, who are his priority in life.  With the loan he plans to buy a cow of good quality for producing milk.  He will buy one which adapts well to the climate and type of fodder in his area and that can give birth to a good calf for further development.  In this way he can increase milk production and the sale of calves to fatten.  With the income gained, his plan is to keep investing in buying materials to improve the property, as well as increasing the quality and quantity of cows.  With this loan he plans to do more. 

 This is the first loan Luis Miguel has receIved from FUDECOSUR.    He has not had a loan from a state bank  in the past, but FUDECOSUR is providing  Luis Miguel the loan with better conditions  and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy a cow to produce milk and calves

loans.name: Happiness Group

texts.en:
The people of this group, 'Happiness,' have an average age of 36 years and two children each, all living in traditional extended families near Chorkor, Accra. These people know one another through ties of kinship, and they have businesses buying and selling materials, sterilizers, slippers, tea, noddles, foodstuffs, porridge and second-hand clothing. 

After having correctly paid back their previous loans, the people of the group Happiness are now on their ninth solidarity loan. 

Mary is 49 years old. She intends to use her loan to purchase one bale of second-hand clothing to sell to customers. She gets her supplies locally from the main market in the city at wholesale prices and sells at retail prices. Her customer base is composed of men and women paying with cash and often on credit. 

She has been making a good profit which will be used to cover expenses related to healthcare, food, clothing, and schooling. The rest will be reinvested in her business. She is married and has children whom she takes care of.

loans.use: To purchase one bale of second-hand clothing to sell to customers.

loans.name: Phaijang B Group

texts.en:
Phaijang B is a group formed by women of common interest to get a loan for buying mini-solar home lighting systems so that their families stay in a better home environment at night, due to the shortage in the power supply in their area.

Lamhat (32), the featured member of the group with her hand raised, is skilled in weaving and devotes most of her time to weaving different types of traditional shawls to generate income. She lives in a very remote village called Phaijang which is a 45-minute drive from Imphal, Manipur. Their family includes the mother, father, and three school-going children. 

She considers education a key to achieve one’s aim in life and had been giving her best effort to give the best to her children to excel in their education. As the area faces insufficient power supply, their daily duties are affected after dusk, especially the study hours of the children after sunset. After buying the mini solar home lighting system, the children are able to study in comfort after dusk and for longer period with better concentration. Their academic performance is much better now which is the reason for availing the loan. 

While the children study under the solar home lighting, the mother does the household chores and weaves in comfort. Her weaving hours were limited before, but now she can weave in the evening and increase her production. The family is very happy to receive such a loan and thanks WSDS for lending such a loan.

loans.use: To buy mini-solar home lighting system

loans.name: Twesigangane Group

texts.en: Fred is a hardworking Ugandan  single man living in Kagadi. He has been selling produce, especially groundnuts, since 2004 to earn an income. He hopes to grow his business despite the challenge of price fluctuations. Fred is requesting a loan to buy groundnuts for resale. He is a member of Twesigangane Group where each member guarantees the other to get a loan since they don’t pledge securities.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts for resale

loans.name: Sadress

texts.en:
Sadress, a 36-year-old married mother of two living in Kasese, Uganda, sells wines and spirits. She earns additional income from a bar, a business she has had for seven years. A hardworking woman, she faces high levels of competition.

Sadress is requesting a loan to buy more wines and spirits to sell. She has a dream to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy wines and spirits to sell

loans.name: Venex

texts.en:
Venex is a male aged 35 married with 4 children living in Kasese, Uganda. Venex has a retail shop. He earns an additional income from the sale of beans and coffee. He has been in that business since 2007.

Venex needs a loan to buy blankets, salt and radios to sell. He has a dream of expanding his business and he is a hardworking man but competition and sunshine are his major challenges.

loans.use: to buy blankets, salt and radios to sell.

loans.name: Natia

texts.en:
Natia is 34 years old. She lives with her parents in Tbilisi, the capital city of Georgia. Natia works as a saleslady and gets a small monthly income. Her father gets orders to renovate houses and generates income. Natia owns a small flat and she wants to rent it out and get additional income, but she needs money to renovate the flat. 

The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of $1,500 to renovate a flat. As soon as the flat is renovated, she will rent it out and will increase her income. Natia awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to renovate a flat and rent it out in order to get additional income

loans.name: Satik

texts.en:
Satik is a farmer from Marmarashen village of Ararat region. She lives with her husband and son. Satik breeds pigs. She also cultivates greens. Farming is the main source of the family's income. As their needs are growing day by day, Satik needs to enlarge her herd to be able to make ends meet. She needs a loan of USD 2,000 to purchase pigs and a truck for the transportation of the harvest. 

Satik and her family will be very thankful to the lenders for their goodwill and support in helping them collect the needed amount of the loan.

loans.use: to pay for pigs and purchase a  truck to transport her harvest

loans.name: Héctor David

texts.es:
Héctor tiene 49 años de edad, es agricultor en la zona donde vive, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y actualmente está soltero, él vive con sus padres y les ayuda económicamente.

Héctor trabaja como agricultor, cultiva dos hectáreas de maíz desde hace seis años, esta actividad se la enseñó su padre quien todavía trabaja junto a él, también se dedica a la crianza de bovinos ya que con estos logra conseguir otros ingresos económicos.

Él solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo para comprar fertilizantes (abono) para aplicarle a su cultivo, ya que falta muy poco tiempo para que rinda frutos.

Su sueño es tener un excelente cultivo ya que el año pasado no fue muy bueno.
texts.en:
Héctor is 49 years old and is a farmer in the area in which he lives. He had no opportunity to study and is single. He lives with his parents and helps them economically.

Héctor works as a farmer, he has cultivated two hectares with corn for the last 6 years. His father taught him this and he still works with him. He also works raising cattle as doing this he manages to create anther economic income.

The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy fertilizer to put on his crops which are soon to mature. His dream is to have an excellent harvest as last year's was not very good.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clothes and electrical goods for resale

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en:
Farzana, is a 42-year-old married woman; she has been doing a business selling bed sheets and spreads for the past five years. She offers a variety of bed sheets and covers. Her husband also assists her in selling them to the people of their community and in the local market. She makes sufficient amount of income to contribute to the family's income. 

In order to improve her business she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for  loan of 40,000 PKR. In this way she will be able to purchase more variety of bed sheets, covers and pillows in various colors and designs. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more variety of bed sheets, covers and pillows in various colors and designs.

loans.name: Asuman

texts.en: Asumani is a 51 year old married man with five children, all attending different schools. He has two other dependents he takes care of. He deals in produce and has been working five days a week and six hours a day since 1997. He usually sells his goods to traders around Lawanda trading center. He also owns a coffee farm in Kiyovu Lawanda Sub County, from which he derives additional income. He hopes to use the loan to boost his agricultural business. He is described as a shrewd man in business and asks lenders to further lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy agricultural produce for resale.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima, age 35, is a married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 55,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her 9th loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, actualmente está acompañado y tiene dos hijos los cuales están estudiando educación básica, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.


Julio desde que estaba muy chico le gustaba el trabajo agrícola ya que su padre siempre lo llevaba y así fue como aprendió la actividad, actualmente trabaja como concejal en la alcaldía y lo realiza desde hace 3 años.

Él necesita el  crédito para pagar una operación que se hará de la vesícula.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando con mucha salud y sabe que lo va a lograr con la ayuda de esa operación.
texts.en:
Julio, who is 38 years old, finished high school, and now lives with his partner.  he has two children who are in elementary school; his partner works as a housewife.  Since he was very small, Julio has liked farming work, since his father always took him along so that he learned about this field of work. 

Currently he works as a councilman in the mayor's office and has been doing so for three years.  Julio needs the loan to pay for a gallbladder operation.  His dream is to continue working in good health, and he knows he can do that when helped by this operation.

loans.use: to pay for a gallbladder operation

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
Nelson de 44 años de edad, estudio hasta 3ºgrado, está casado  y su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen 5 hijo, todos viven con ellos estudian 3er año de bachillerato, 9º, 9º, 2º y el ultimo aun no estudia, nadie más vive con ellos
El señor desde su niñez se ha dedicado a los trabajos  del campo y aprendió ya que su padre le enseño a sembrar. Actualmente siembra 10,500 metros cuadros de maíz y 3,500 de maicillo, además tiene ganado propio, la siembra la hace a unos 20 minutos del hogar y se va caminando.
El crédito lo necesita para comprar dos novillas para crecerlas y reproducirlas,  pues cuenta con los conocimientos necesarios para realizar dicha labor.
Espera que sus hijos continúen estudiando hasta que sean profesionales y a nivel del negocio espera contar con una ganadería lechera en un par de años; poder generar las ganancias para que a su familia no le falte nada.
texts.en:
Nelson is 44 years old and studied through the third grade.  He is married and his wife works in their home.  They have 5 children, all of whom are students and live at home.  One is in the third year of high school, two in 9th grade, one in 2nd and the last is too young to go to school. 

Nelson from his childhood has worked in the fields and he learned from his father who taught him to plant.  Currently he plants 10,500 square meters of corn and 3500 of Hominy, and he also has his own livestock. His fields are located around 20 minutes from his home by foot.  

He needs a loan in order to purchase calves in order to raise them and breed them.  He has the necessary knowledge to complete this task.  He hopes that his children will continue to study until they become professionals and on the business front he hopes to build a milking herd in a few years.  He wants to generate enough income so that his family does not lack for anything.
