texts.en: Benon is a first time borrower and a member of Katookye Abamwe Group. He operates a millet grinding machine which is his major source of income. He has applied for a loan of UGX 500,000 (five hundred shillings only) to buy millet and other maize for grinding and then selling. He started grinding millet in the year 2004 with high hopes of using the profits he got from the business to educate his five children and an orphan who are all in school at the moment. His business is in his local cell of residence Katookye, Kabwohe, Sheema District and his major clients are the people around his area especially those with parties. He is a hardworking man but is faced with a challenge of competition from other business people of the same category but is ready to beat competition through his hard work. Despite the challenge, Benon is determined to carry on his business to be able to achieve his long time dream of being financially stable.

loans.use: to buy millet and maize.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
No hay edad para emprender cualquier actividad en la vida para superarse y llegar ha ser alguien diferente, la vida le dio una oportunidad para trabajar como empleado de una tienda de consumos diarios.  Era lo que él esperaba, no sólo una puerta abierta sino lo que estaba detrás de esa puerta.  Y lo que encontró fue algo que definió lo que él quería ser. Diego de 52 años de edad tiene tres hijos estudiantes en su comunidad y son excelentes estudiantes, el a querido abrir puertas para el futuro para sus hijos para que ellos tengan las condicione de vidas adecuadas en el futuro.

La actividad que el desempeña con todo empeño es la venta de abarrotería en su comunidad dicho negocio a el le a funcionado porque no tiene mucha competencia por el lugar y eso le genera ganancias para poder sustentar a su familia que tanto lo necesitan, para tener una condición de vida adecuada en un futuro no muy lejano el lleva realizando dicha actividad durante diez años.

El uso respectivo que le dará al crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de mercadería de abarrotería para surtir más su tienda par tener a la disposición de la clientela los productos de primera necesidad. Uno de los sueños de Diego es ver crecer a sus hijos y convertirse en profesionales en el campo de la educación y llegar a niveles importantes en empresas de prestigios.
texts.en:
There isn't an age to embark on whatever activity in life to improve oneself and become a different person; life gave him the opportunity to work as an employee in a store of products for daily consumption.  It was what he hoped for, not only an open door, but also what was behind this door. And what he found was something that defined what he wanted to be. Diego is 52 years old, has 3 children who are students in the community and are excellent students, and he has wanted to open doors for his children's future so that they can have satisfactory living conditions in the future.  

The work that he undertakes with determination is selling groceries in his community.  This business has worked for him because there isn't much competition in the area and this generates profits for him to be able to support his family in what they need, to have a suitable living conditions in the not-so-distant future. He has worked in this business for ten years.  

The respective use that he will give this loan he is requesting is to purchase grocery store merchandise to stock his store more to have ready for his customers the essential goods that they need. One of Diego's dreams is to see his children grow and become professionals in the field of education and get to important levels in prestigious businesses.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for a grocery store.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.es: Luciana de 54 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 2 hijos de 23 y 27 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida elaborando y vendiendo tamales de elote, actividad que realiza desde hace 20 años en el mercado de su municipio. Luciana desea encementar el piso y construir un pasamano en el corredor de su vivienda. Por lo anterior Luciana solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillos, y pagar mano de obra necesaria para construir un pasamano y encementar el piso de su corredor.
texts.en: Luciana, 54, lives in her own house with her two children who are 23 and 27 years old. She is an enterprising woman who earns her living making and selling corn tamales, work she has done for the past 20 years in a market in her municipality. Luciana wants to cement the floor and build a railing for the outdoor hallway of her house. For this, Luciana asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and to pay the necessary labor costs to build a railing and cement the floor of her outdoor hallway.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and pay the necessary labor costs to construct a railing and cement the floor of her outdoor hallway.

loans.name: Zephanus

texts.en:
Zephanus used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell.  He lives in Kasese Uganda and operates  business for rentals, tailoring, coffee,  and raising pigs to supplement his income. He is a hardworking, loving father with a dream of developing his land and educating his children. 

Zephanus needs a loan to complete the purchase of his land.

loans.use: to complete the purchase of his land.

loans.name: Alberto Kenedy

texts.es:
Alberto Kenedy tiene 44 años de edad, vive en casa alquilada de material rustico, vive con su hermana, cuenta con un hijo de 15 años el cual cursa la secundaria en el colegio nacional del distrito de Pomahuaca. Él vive en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Alberto Kenedy es el transporte de mototaxi, cuenta con 5 años de experiencia, además Alberto Kenedy se dedica a dar servicio de albañeleria como obrero, ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el crédito sin ningun problema. El destino del crédito será para ivertir en mantenimiento y compra de llantas de su unidad movil propia, lo que le va a permitir asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo.
texts.en: Alberto Kenedy, age 44, lives in a modestly-built house that he rents. He lives with his sister and has a 15-year-old son who attends the Pomahuaca District High School. He lives in a rural part of the Pucará District in Jaén Province, Cajamarca Region in northern Perú.   Alberto has his own mototaxi business, which he has operated for five years. In addition, Alberto does masonry work as a day-laborer. With his earnings, he will have no problem paying off this loan, which he plans to use to make repairs to and buy tires for his mototaxi. This will allow him to keep the most important equipment of his business in good working order.

loans.use: to invest in maintenance and buy tires for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Fortunata Rosalia

texts.es:
Fortunata es una mujer de 44 años de edad, soltera, madre de tres hijos y su negocio es la cría de conejos, gallinas y patos para el comercio.
Ella es emprendedora, entusiasta, comunicadora, fuerte, luchadora, persistente, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la comunidad de Sacaba que se encuentra a 14 km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba a una altitud entre 2,620 y 4,520 metros sobre el nivel del mar. En este municipio tienen sus viviendas de residencia la mayoría de los agricultores que desarrollan actividades en el trópico, estas residencias de Sacaba son usadas cuando sacan sus productos del trópico a comercializarlos en la ciudad.
Fortunata es de tez morena, cabello largo negro amarrado, estatura mediana y su lengua natal es el Quechua que utiliza para comunicarse con su entorno social, en la ciudad utiliza el español para el comercio. En su negocio las gallinas y gallos duermen en un solo gallinero, los patos al lado del arroyo y lo conejos en un cuarto de madera continuo, Por más agresivos que sean los gallos, no lastiman a ningún animal de la granja. Las cualidades del conejo se refieren a la calidad de la carne y su facultad de adaptarse a los distintos medios, por ser una especie de tamaño pequeño necesita poca inversión y su tamaño permite satisfacer el autoconsumo familiar, y puede criarse por una mano de obra que no disponga de gran fuerza física como mujeres, niños o ancianos.
Ella sueña tener un negocio estable y rentable, realizando la compra de alimento para aves y de esa manera incrementar su negocio para hacer frente a la competencia.
Es por esos motivos que Fortunata solicita un préstamo para la compra de alimento para aves y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Fortunata, 44, is a single mother of three children. Her business is raising rabbits, chickens, and ducks which she then sells. She is enterprising, enthusiastic, communicative, strong, determined, persistent, responsible, and very hardworking. She works in the community of Sacaba, which is 14 kilometers away from the city of Cochabamba. The altitude is between 2,620 and 4,520 meters above sea level. Many farmers from the tropics have a residence in this municipality. They use these residences when they take their products from the tropics to sell in the city.

Fortunata has tanned skin and long black hair. She is of average height. Her native language is Quechua, which she uses to communicate in her social environment. In the city, she uses Spanish for business. 

In her business, she has a chicken coop for both chickens and hens. The ducks are beside a river and the rabbits are in a wooden room. Even though the chickens are aggressive, they do not hurt any other animals on the farm. The qualities of rabbits include the quality of their meat and their ability to adapt to different materials. As they are a species of small size, they need little investment and their size allows them to satisfy a family's consumption. They can be raised by workers who do not have great physical strength, such as women, children or the elderly.

Fortunata dreams of having a stable and profitable business by buying feed for her poultry, thereby growing her business to become stronger against the competition. Therefore, she has applied for a loan to buy feed for her poultry and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed for her poultry and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Carlos es un señor colombiano que ya vive 7 años en Ecuador y trabaja de albañil, al jornal o en lo que haya, comenta que se alejo de su país natal en busca de trabajo y sobre todo una vida tranquila y un mejor futuro para su familia y que en Ecuador lo encontró, el es casado y tiene 2 hijos que asisten a la escuela, su esposa trabaja de empleada doméstica, Carlos agradece a Fodemi por darle su primer crédito hace 3 años con el que empezó al negocio de crianza de chanchos, en esta ocasión también va a invertir el crédito  comprando chanchitos, Carlos aspira mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos para comprase un lotecito donde pueda criar mas animales.
texts.en: Carlos is a Colombian man who's lived in Ecuador for seven years. He works as a bricklayer, as a day laborer or on whatever job he can find. He says he left his home country in search of work and, above all, a quiet life and a better future for his family; he found both in Ecuador. He is married and has two children who are in school. His wife works as a domestic employee. Carlos is grateful to FODEMI for giving him his first loan three years ago to start his business selling pigs. This loan will also be used to buy pigs. Carlos hopes to improve his business and ultimately his income so that eventually he can buy a small lot where he can raise more animals.

loans.use: buy pigs

loans.name: William Ricardo

texts.es:
William, es un hombre soltero y muy emprendedor, se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, un visionario y buen negociante. 

Siempre ha trabajado como comerciante, vendiendo distintos tipos de mercancía como empleado en varios almacenes.

Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que William acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar mercancía como zapatillas y lociones para iniciar con su propio negocio comercial y poder cumplir su sueño de por fin ser independiente, adicionalmente necesita también una vitrina para exhibir los productos. 

William es un hombre muy organizado y le gustaría ofrecer a sus clientes una gran variedad de productos de diversos lugares del país, y se siente con toda la capacidad para emprender este proyecto.

La suma de todo estos esfuerzos le brindarían a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente y sin mayores inconvenientes.
texts.en:
William is a very enterprising bachelor. He is a very responsible and hard-working man, in addition to being a visionary and a good businessman. He has always worked as a businessman, selling different types of merchandise by being employed in different stores.

He has known how to get beyond difficult times in business, and he dreams of buying his own house and of having a business that endures. For this reason, William decided to request a loan, which he will use to buy merchandise like slippers and lotions to begin his own business and to be able to achieve his dream of being independent. He also needs a shop window to exhibit his products.

William is a very organized man, and he would like to offer his clients a large variety of products from different parts of the country, and he believes in his ability to start this project.

The sum of all these efforts will offer his family an excellent quality of life without big issues.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like lotions and slippers and to buy a shop window to begin a business and settle his household expenses.

loans.name: Andri

texts.en:
Andri lives with his wife and his only child in West Bandung, a regency area located in West Java. Andri runs a small shop that sells mobile phones, mobile phone accessories and mobile phone airtime credits, and also provides utility bill payment services. He joined Ruma because he wanted to increase his income by selling mobile airtime and processing bill payments. Nowadays, he can process up to 40 transactions per day as he also manages six down-line staff members. 

As the business continues to grow, Andri hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to enable him to process more airtime sales on weekends. This  would help him in the running of the mobile airtime business and consequently support his plan to seek more business opportunities in the future. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions on weekends

loans.name: Jhonson

texts.en:
Jhonson lives with his wife in Bogor, a city located at the south of Jakarta. Jhonson runs a small car repair shop, mobile phone airtime credits, and utility bill payment service. He joined Ruma because he wanted to increase his income and sell mobile airtime and process bill payments. 

He can process up to 40 transactions per day.  As the business continues to grow, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to enable him to process  more airtime sales on the weekends. This loan would help him to run the mobile airtime business and consequently support his plan to seek more business opportunities in the future. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions on weekends.

loans.name: Taufik

texts.en:
Taufik, his wife,  and child live in Depok, a city located at the south of Jakarta. Taufik runs a small stall that sells snacks, drinks, mobile phone accessories, mobile phone airtime credits, and utility bill payment services. He joined Ruma a month ago because he wanted to increase his income by selling mobile airtime and processing bill payments. 

He can process up to 75-150 transactions per day.  As the business continues to grow, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to enable him to process more airtime sales on the weekends. This loan would help him to run the mobile airtime business and consequently support his plan to seek additional opportunities in the future. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions on weekends.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stylish ready-made women's and children's clothes and different kinds of accessories and makeup for resale.

loans.name: Asael Antonio

texts.es:
Asael de 45 años de edad, tiene estudios hasta noveno grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen cuatro hijos, tres niñas y un niño y los cuatro están realizando sus estudios, por lo tanto son los únicos que dependen de Asael.

Asael tiene un taller de estructuras metálicas, hace 15 años se dedica a este oficio, pues vio que es una buena fuente de ingresos para su hogar, él está muy agradecido con un amigo suyo pues fue quien le enseñó este trabajo que hoy en día le está sirviendo mucho.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar cemento, arena y demás material que le sirva para el mejoramiento de su hogar, pues las paredes no están en buen estado y necesitan reparación, esto le ayudara a vivir en un hogar más seguro junto a su esposa e hijos.


Su sueño es que sus hijos sean unos profesionales, que puedan terminar sus estudios y vivir en una casa más segura.
texts.en:
Asael, age 45, has a ninth grade education.  He is married, and his wife devotes herself to the household chores.  They have four children, three girls and one boy.  The four of them go to school.  They are Asael’s only dependents.

Asael has a metal shop, and he has been engaged in this trade for 15 years.  He saw that it is a good source of income for his household.  He is very grateful to a friend of his.  It was his friend who taught him this work that is now very useful to him.

He needs the loan to buy cement, sand, and other material to improve his home.  The walls are not in good shape, and they need repair.  This will help him live with his wife and children in a safer home.

His dream is that his children become professionals, that they are able to finish their education, and to live in a safer house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and other material to improve his home.

loans.name: Allen

texts.en:
Allen is a repeat client to the organization and is securing a loan of UGX 4,000,000.
  
She is married with 6 children. She is hardworking and she provides catering services as her main source of income. She relied on her business for her financial needs for a period of 8 years but later she found out that her business alone cannot meet all her needs including school fees. That is why she decided to join UGAFODE for financial assistance. She is taking this loan to buy more catering materials like saucepans, plates, and serving dishes and is hopeful that her dream of business expansion is going to be achieved. Allen praises UGAFODE for financial assistance which has enabled her to educate her children and maintain her business.

loans.use: to buy saucepans, plates, and serving dishes for her business.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Las calles de Suchitepéquez es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en las blusas, cortes y fajas típicas.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello, es la actividad que Juana realiza de 42 años de edad soltera que cuenta con cuatro hijos por los cuales está decidido a luchar por la vida y abrir nuevas puertas hacia el futuro, los primeros dos hijos ya tienen familia propias y los dos últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad.
	
La actividad que ella desempeña es la elaboración de güipiles, cortes y fajas típicas, ella viene realizando dicha actividad durante 15 años ella ha venido realizando un gran esfuerzo para poder elaborar sus actividades de la mejor calidad y diversos estilos para poder atraer a más clientes para tener un mejor ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que ella le dará al crédito es para la compra de materia prima como hilos de diferentes colores y otros insumos que se requieren en la elaboración de su actividad para poder tener un ingreso económico. Uno de las grandes aspiraciones de Juana es ver que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en los diferentes campos laborales y agrandar más su negocio para así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The streets of Suchitepéquez are witness to the most pleasant colors drenched in the traditional blouses, skirts and sashes.  It is impossible that any tourist would not admire this product, pause, and make a good purchase of it. It is the work that Juana does, who is 42 years old and single with four children for whom she determined to fight for the life and open new doors toward the future. The first two children already have their own families, and the last two are excellent students in the community school.  

The work that she undertakes is making traditional güipiles (woven tops), cortes (woven skirts) and sashes. She has been doing this work for 15 years; she has been exerting a lot of effort to be able to produce work of the best quality and a variety of styles to be able to attract more customers to have a better income to improve the living conditions of her family. 

The respective use that she will give the loan is to purchase raw materials such as different colors of thread and other supplies that she needs to carry out her work to be able to have an income. One of Juana's great aspirations is to see her children become professionals in different fields of work and to expand her business more to have more income.

loans.use: to purchase raw material for traditional clothing

loans.name: Magret

texts.en: Magret is an old client to the organization. She does cattle fattening which she has done for over 26 years. She took a loan of UGX 1,500,000. She is a 64-year-old married client with 10 children. Four children are still attending school. She lives in Rugongo village, Buyanja Sub County, Rubabo, Rukungiri District. She took this loan to buy more cows for fattening and to increase her income. Her dream is expanding her business and using this loan from UGAFODE. Magret is hopeful her business is going to expand with continuous financial support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: By His Grace Group

texts.en:
The By His Grace group is made up of four women. They are enterprising small business owners who bring home the daily bread for their families. They are selling port meat, drinks, frozen fish, meat, groceries, plates, kerosene and cooking oil.

This group is represented by Beatrice, who is 37 years old and married with two children. She makes a living selling groceries, plates, kerosene and cooking oil at the market. She started this business eleven years ago with the help of her family and her husband. This is the seventh time she is working with financing from the institution. She has applied for a loan to buy groceries, plates, kerosene and cooking oil to sell to customers at the market.

Other members are Janet, 37, who sells groceries in a kiosk in her neighborhood, Elizabeth, 45, who sells port meat in her home, and Janet, 37, who sells groceries.

loans.use: to buy groceries, plates, kerosene and cooking oil to sell to customers at the market.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is an old client to the organization who applied for a loan of UGX 5,000,000. He runs a business of cattle fattening as his major source of income and has been doing this business for more than 7 years. The purpose of the loan is to buy more cows so that he can increase his income and get profits and raise money to maintain his family, pay school fees for his siblings and develop himself. Wilson is an honest and hardworking man but is always limited by capital. His dream is running a large scale cattle fattening business.
 
With this loan from UGAFODE, Wilson is hopeful that the situation will improve gradually.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Viviana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Viviana tiene 24 años de edad vive en el cantón Echeandia provincia de Bolivar su estado civil es soltera vive con sus papas y su hijo de 1 año,
Ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos,utilizara el dinero del crédito para la compra de  alimento para los cerdos. las compras realiza en Echeandia todas las semanas, Su sueño es tener una casa propia y un negocio. Ella enfrenta los desafios que se le presentan en la vida, en el tiempo libre descansa y se dedica a su familia.
texts.en: Viviana, age 24, lives in the canton of Echeandia of Bolivar province. She is single and she lives with her parents and her one-year-old son. She is in the business of raising pigs. She will use the money from this loan to buy feed for her pigs when she makes her weekly trip into Echeandia. She dreams of having her own home and her own business. Viviana confronts the challenges that life has presented her with. In her free time, she rests and spends time with her family.

loans.use: buy feed for her pigs

loans.name: David Elias

texts.es:
David tiene 65 años de edad vive en el cantón Echeandia provincia de Bolivar estado civil soltero  vive solo.

El se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado.
El utilizara el dinero del crédito para la compra de gando y cerdos para engordarles y venderlos. Realiza las compras en la  ciudad de Echeandia y guaranda, su sueños es comprarse un terreno y cultivarlo. En su tiempo libre le gusta leer.
texts.en:
David, 65, lives in the canton of Echeandia in the province of Bolivar. He is single and lives alone.

He makes a living by buying and selling livestock. He will use this loan to buy cattle and pigs to fatten and sell. He makes his sales in the cities of Echeandia and Guaranda. His dream is to buy and cultivate land. In his free time, he likes to read.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Eliab

texts.en:
Eliab is a 43-year married man with five children; two attend school. 

Eliab used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell and building materials to construct  his house. He has managed to build his house to a partially completed level. Due the changes in designs and customer preferences, Eliab complains of inadequate capital and therefore requests a  loan  to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Uzila

texts.en:
Uzila is a 32 year old married male  with five children; four attend school.  They live in Kasese-Uganda. 

Uzila has a retail shop and farms for additional income. He began the business to have income, educate his children, and expand his business. 

Uzila needs a loan to buy sugar, salt, soap, cosmetics, rice and other items to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, soap, cosmetics, rice and other items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a fast food cart, the containers and packaging needed to keep the food safe and and the basic ingredients for hamburgers, hot dogs, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Daniel

texts.es:
A sus 17 años de edad Carlos se puede dar el lujo de ser una persona pionera en su sector y es que es el único que se dedica al transporte de licores en la zona. 

Sus ganas de trabajas y salir adelante son admirables un joven que piensa en estudiar y trabajar para pagar sus estudios, su sueño es poder tener clientela fija, ser muy conocido en el sector y que su forma de ganarse la vida genere recursos para sacar a su madre de trabajar pues son quiere que se desgaste más en un trabajo y que solo se dedique al hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de una motocicleta para transportarse en los diferentes sectores y ser más eficiente.
texts.en:
At just 17 years of age, Carlos has the distinction of being a true pioneer in his area, as he is the only one who is dedicated to transporting alcohol.  Both his earnings and his drive to success are admirable. He is a young man planning on going to school and working to pay for his schooling. His dream is to have a fixed clientele and be well known in the area. He also hopes that his means of earning a living generate enough income that his mother will no longer have to work. He doesn't want to her to have to wear herself out at a job anymore, but rather to be able to devote herself to the home life. 

He is requesting this loan to buy a motorcycle, which will help him transport his merchandise to different sectors and be more efficient.

loans.use: buy a motorcycle and improve his delivery efficiency

loans.name: Deusdedit

texts.en:
Deusdedit is a hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He owns a hardware store and earns additional money as a tailor. 

He started this business to look after his family. He has inadequate capital to meet the high demand and he wishes to diversify his business.

He intends to use the loan to buy more hardware items to sell.

loans.use: to buy more hardware items to sell.

loans.name: Marleny Aracely

texts.es:
Marleny tiene 43 años de edad,  no tiene ningún nivel de estudio pues en su niñez sus padres no pudieron darle ese privilegio, por lo cual tuvo que dedicarse a los oficios del hogar, tiene dos hijas que se encuentran estudiando y dependen de ella.

Marleny no tiene una actividad productiva en especial, pero de vez en cuando elabora comida rápida para vender y así obtener algún ingreso para ella y sus hijas ya que es madre soltera.

Este crédito lo necesita para instalar energía eléctrica en su hogar ya que es algo indispensable para ella al momento de realizar labores del hogar.

Su sueño más grande es que sus hijas sean personas emprendedoras y logren sacar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Marleny, age 43, does not have an education.  Her parents were not able to give her this privilege in her childhood.  Therefore, she had to devote herself to the household chores.  She has two daughters, who go to school and are dependent upon her.

Marleny does not have a particular business activity.  From time to time she makes fast food to sell.  This way she gets some income for herself and her daughters.  She is a single mother.

She needs the loan to install electricity in her home.  It is indispensable in order for her to do the work around the house.

Her biggest dream is for her daughters to be enterprising people, and that they manage to get a professional career.

loans.use: to install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.es:
Rosita tiene 63 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Saña, la cual es una comunidad tranquila, donde se respira paz y armonia.

Rosita se dedica a las actividad de venta de ropa con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, el cual se ubica en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para compra de mercadería, dicha inversión le servirá para poder tener un mayor número de stock en su inventario y tener asi una variedad y diversidad de estilos de ropa que ofrecer a su público conusmidor; de esta forma le podrá captar a un número mayor de clientes y asi aumentar sus ventas, lo que también le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejora en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosita, 63, is single and lives in her own house in the district of Saña. It is a quiet community which breathes peace and harmony.

Rosita makes a living selling clothing. She has more than three years of experience in her business, which is located in her home. She has applied for a loan to buy merchandise. This investment will help her to have a higher amount of stock in her inventory, as well as to have a variety of diverse clothing styles to offer her clients. She will then be able to attract a higher number of clients and improve her sales. This will also allow her to have a higher income, better profits and an improvement in her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Augstine

texts.en:
Augustine is a  46-year-old  married man with seven children.  They live in Kasese Uganda. 

He has operated a second-hand shoe business since 2012. He also farms to earn additional income. Augustine began the business as a main source of income to support his family.  He would like to  expand his business. 

Augustine is hard working however inadequate capital is a challenge he faces. He will use the loan to buy second-hand shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy second-hand shoes to sell.

loans.name: Amon,

texts.en:
Amon is a 31-year-old married man with three children, they live in Kasese,Uganda. 

He has operated a butcher shop and hotel for three years. He also has a retail shop and farms for additional income. He began the business to generate income for his family. 

Amon is a hardworking, honest person who wants to see his working capital increase. He intends to use money to buy pigs to slaughter and sell.

loans.use: to buy pigs to sell.

loans.name: Jerusalen De Viacha Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “JERUSALEN DE VIACHA” iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Cascada, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Alicia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: servicio de filmaciones, venta de comida, venta de fruta, trenzado de mantas, decoración de locales, venta de salchipapa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Alicia es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió por iniciativa propia hace cuatro años, al observar el amplio comercio de estos productos en el mercado. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de abarrotes por mayor) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará a en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y las capacitaciones que le ofrece la institución.

En la imagen no esta presente una de las socias, la misma se marcho a su negocio por motivos de urgencia.
texts.en:
The community bank "Jerusalen de Viacha" will begin its fifth term with Pro Mujer as part of the Cascada regional office. It is comprised of eight members and is run by a board of directors with Alicia as the president. The members run a wide variety of businesses, including film services, food sales, fruit sales, blanket weaving, store decorating, and snack sales.

This loan will benefit all of the small businesses in Alice's group. She joined Pro Mujer two years ago at the invitation of a friend who is a member of the institution. She currently has a business selling food. She started the business on her own four years ago upon seeing how well this type of business was doing in the market.

She will use this loan to increase her capital by purchasing groceries at wholesale from the markets in the city of El Alto. She will later sell her food at her own stall. This work lets her generate enough income to support her family, as she is married and has a child.  

When asked what she likes best about Pro Mujer, she said she likes the health services and the training that the institution provides. 

One member is not present in the image above; she had to leave for her work on an urgent matter.

loans.use: buy groceries at wholesale

loans.name: Laurentina

texts.en:
Laurentina is a fifty-year-old hard working married woman with nine children.  They live in Kamwenge-Uganda. 

She sells second hand clothes in open the market.  This is her main source of income. She was inspired to start this business to increase on her income and look after her family. She faces competition, seasonal customer demands, and weather changes that stop customers from shopping. She hopes to  own a permanent  boutique in the future.

She requests a loan to buy more second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Iris Margorth

texts.es:
Iris de 33 años de edad estudió hasta el bachillerato, está casada y tiene un hijo, su esposo se dedica a la albañilería y su  hijo aún no tiene la edad para asistir a la escuela.

Iris tiene un negocio de venta de tortillas, actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años y que aprendió de su madre, a pesar de que es un trabajo pesado le permite ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar herramientas de albañilería para que su esposo pueda realizar un mejor trabajo, también comprará maíz y leña para su negocio de tortillas. 

Su sueño es poder salir adelante junto a su familia, que su hijo crezca sano y poder darle el estudio que se merece.
texts.en:
Iris, age 33, went to school through high school.  She is married and has a son.  Her husband is a bricklayer.  Her son is still not old enough to go to school.

Iris has a business of selling tortillas.  She has been doing this for six years.  She learned from her mother.  In spite the fact that it is hard work, it allows her to help her husband with the household expenses.

She needs the loan to buy bricklaying tools for her husband so that he can do better work.  She will also buy corn and firewood for her tortilla business.

Her dream is to be able to get ahead together with her family.  She also dreams of her son growing up healthy and being able to give him the education he deserves.

loans.use: to buy bricklaying tools for her husband and to buy corn and firewood for her tortilla business.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a 38-year old married man living in Kamwenge Uganda. 

He farms and earns additional income from his retail shop. He started this business to improve his standard of living. His challenges are prolonged drought, lack of capital,  and damaged crops from pests and diseases. He hopes to become a prominent modern farmer in his society. 

Andrew requests a loan to buy pesticides and manure for his farm.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and manure for his farm.

loans.name: Norbey

texts.es:
Norbey vive en la vereda de la unión y se desempeña como mayordomo en una finca cuidando sus bellos paisajes, flora, fauna y ganado tiene 25 años de edad y dos hijos de 4, 2 años de edad y está casado lo que hace suponer una gran madurez y seriedad en sus actividades. 

Desea iniciar su propio negocio de cría de ganado bovino (ganado de levante) con lo que generara sus propios recursos y aprovechara que sus jefes les prestaran terrenos para tener su ganado por tal razón quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de una vaca y cuido con la que iniciara su vida como independiente. 

Sueña con tener un ganado lechero tan extenso y con tantas vacas que no las puedo contar. Un sueño muy ambicioso pero que hará todo lo posible para cumplirlo.
texts.en:
Norbey lives in the village of La Unión and works as a caretaker on a farm, taking care of its beautiful landscape, flora, fauna, and cattle. He is 25 years old and has 2 children, ages 4 and 2, and is married, which causes him to show great maturity and seriousness in his work. 

He wants to start his own business raising cattle (which have been weaned) with which he will generate his own resources and take advantage of the land his bosses will lend him to have his cattle. For this reason, he wants to ask for a loan to purchase a cow and feed to start his independent life. 

He dreams of having dairy cattle so extensive and with so many cows that it would be impossible to count them. This is a very ambitious dream, but he will do everything possible to achieve it.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to start a dairy micro-business and food to feed it correctly.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La valentía, la constancia y las ganas de superación han sido factores importantes que han permitido a Elsa a salir adelante. Cada día tras haber preparado a sus hijos para la escuela, ordena su casa de habitación para poder trabajar en un ambiente ordenado, desde hace cuatro años se dedica a la venta de gaseosas y ropa, tanto de niños como para adultos, comercializa en los barrios más cercanos. Sus clientes agradecen por los productos y la atención de calidad que ella ofrece, razón por la que mantienen fidelidad. Tiene 35 años, está soltera y tiene tres niños de 14, 8 y 5 años, a quienes quiere brindarle un futuro próspero. 
Elsa solicita el crédito para incrementar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar gaseosas y ropa para niños y adultos, desde pantalones, camisas hasta ropa interior. Su estabilidad económica depende de la comercialización de estos productos, razón por la que deposita su confianza en el financiamiento. Uno de sus objetivos principales es lograr cubrir la demanda se sus clientes y al mismo tiempo aumentar su ingresos, de manera que pueda  brindarle a sus hijos salud y educación de calidad. Una de sus metas es lograr mejorar su casa y establecer una pulpería, sabe que es capaz porque gracias a su esmero, logró cambiar las tablas de su casa por madera. Luchará hasta lograrlo.
texts.en:
Bravery, perseverance and a desire to overcome have been important factors in Elsa's success. Every day after getting her children ready for school, she tidies her home so that she can work in an orderly environment. She has been selling soft drinks and clothing for children and adults for four years. She makes sales in the neighborhoods closest to her. Her clients are grateful for her products and for her good service, which is why they are faithful to her. She is 35 years old and single with three children, ages 5, 8 and 14. She wants to give them a prosperous future.

Elsa has applied for a loan to increase her capital. She needs to buy soft drinks and clothing for children and adults, from pants and shirts to underwear. Her financial stability depends on selling these products, so she is putting her trust into this loan. 

One of her main goals is to fulfill her clients' demand while simultaneously increasing her income, thereby offering her children health and a good quality education. Another of her goals is to improve her home and set up a grocery store. She knows that she is capable of this because thanks to her hard work, she managed to change out the boards in her house for wooden ones. She will fight until she achieves her goal.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and clothing for children and adults, including pants, shirts, and underwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheeting, purlins, and pins to replace the roof on her house.

loans.name: Jovia

texts.en:
Jovia is a 49-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda who deals in selling bicycle spare parts. She earns additional income from battery charging. She started this business to increase her household income and improve her standard of living. She faces the challenges of price fluctuation and competition.

She is requesting a loan to buy more bicycle spare parts for resale.

loans.use: to buy more bicycle spare parts for resale.

loans.name: St  Lucy Rwenguhyo Group

texts.en:
Victoria a 53-year-old widowed female has six children, three of whom attend school. She is a member of St Lucy Rwenguhyo, and is living in Kasese, Uganda. 

She is a food vender dealing in fresh foods.  She began the business to have a source of income to pay school fees for her children. She dreams of finishing her residential house and expanding her business, however she is faced with a challenge of limited capital and competition. 

Victoria is hardworking, and intends to use the loan to buy bananas, avocados and other fresh foods to sell.

loans.use: to buy bananas, avocados and other fresh foods

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 51-year-old male, married with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He is a farmer dealing in tomatoes, onions, rice, oranges, bananas and mangos; he also does animal rearing as additional income. 

He used the previous loan to hire a tractor and human labour for farming. He complains of unpredictable weather changes and inadequate capital to meet his family's demands.

Robert wants money to buy fertilizer to increase productivity and pay for labour.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to increase productivity and to pay for labour

loans.name: Deborah

texts.en:
Deborah is a hardworking woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She deals in livestock and practices farming. She started this business in order to improve her standard of living. However, she faces a challenge of the lack of enough capital coupled with unpredictable seasonal changes whereby animals lack water and grass to feed on. She has dreams of expanding her business.

She is requesting for a loan to buy more cattle for her farm.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for her farm.

loans.name: Lorena Idalia

texts.es: Lorena de 34 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 2, 12 y 5 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida vendiendo fresco en la entrada de su cantón desde hace 3 años. Lorena desea terminar de construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, polines y pines para terminar de construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda.
texts.en: Lorena, 34 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their three children, ages 2, 12, and 5.  She is an enterprising woman who has earned her living selling soft drinks in the entrance to her canton for the past three years. Lorena wants to finish building a bedroom in her house so she asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase cement, sand, gravel, brick, purlins, and pins to finish the construction of a bedroom in her house.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, purlins, and pins to finish building a bedroom in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides and seedlings for his farm business.

loans.name: Godiano

texts.en:
Godiano is a 50-year-old married man with four children, ages 22, 19, 18 and 16 living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in farm produce. He started this business to educate his children. He faces challenges of unfavorable weather and thieves. He has hopes of being a successful and prominent farmer and businessman.

He is requesting for a loan to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Edison

texts.es:
Edison es un hombre de 24 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos y su negocio es la reparación de automóviles.
Él es emprendedor, responsable, independiente, y muy trabajador, su taller de chapería se encuentra en la zona ’16 de julio’ de la ciudad de El Alto, esta zona se caracteriza por concentrar una diversidad de comercios en todas las áreas, en ese lugar se puede encontrar desde un alfiler hasta un  tractor.
Edison es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello corto negro. Su negocio es un taller de chapa y pintura. Él se encarga de reparar y desabollar todo tipo de daño en automóviles, como; golpes, ralladuras, abolladuras, cambio de parabrisas, etc.
Su deseo de generar mejores ingresos económicos lo ha llevado a expandir su negocio en otra área, como es la del transporte público, él quiere realizar la compra de un automóvil para utilizarlo como taxi y tener un nuevo negocio.
Es por esos motivos que Edison solicita un préstamo para la compra de un automóvil para trabajar como taxi.
texts.en:
Edison is a 24-year-old man, single, without children, and his business is repairing vehicles.

He is enterprising, responsible, independent and very hard-working.  His auto-body shop is in the "16 de julio" zone in the city of El Alto. This zone is characterized for the concentrated diversity of businesses of all kinds, in this place one can find everything from a pin to a tractor.  

Edison is tanned, of medium height, and has short black hair. His business is an auto-body and paint shop. He is in charge of repairing and fixing all sorts of damage on cars such as dents, scratches, dings, replacing windshields, etc.

His desire to generate more income has brought him to expand his business in another area, which is public transportation. He wants to purchase a car to use as a taxi and have a new business. 

For these reasons, Edison asks for a loan to purchase a car to serve as a taxi.

loans.use: to purchase a car to serve as a taxi.

loans.name: Galo Enrique

texts.es:
Galo tiene 40 años de edad vive en el cantón Echeandia provincia de Bolivar, comunidad Camaron estado civil soltero el vive con su padre.
El se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de guineo y al comercio de ganado. Utilizara el dinero del crédito para comprar ganado, realiza las compras en las  ciudad de Echeandia toda las semanas, su sueño es mejorar en la ecomonia y engrandecer la siembra de guineo y la meta que tiene es llegar hacer un gadanerdo mayorista, en los tiempos libres el se dedica al deporte.
texts.en:
Galo is 40 years old and lives in the canton of Echeandia, Bolivar province, Camaron community.  He is single and lives with his father.

He works in agriculture; he grows bananas and sells cattle. He will use the money from the loan to purchase cattle. He does his shopping in the city of Echeandia every week.  His dream is to improve economically and enlarge his banana crop and the goal that he has is to be become a cattle wholesaler. In his free time he plays sports.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Duncan

texts.en:
Duncan is a 35-year-old hardworking married man with four children aged 2, 4, 7 and 10 living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He carries out produce selling of coffee and maize, a business he started to educate his children. He faces a challenge of lack of adequate capital and unfavorable weather conditions that lead to low productivity. He has hopes of being a prominent businessman and having educated children to the university level.

He is requesting for a loan to buy more coffee and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more coffee and maize

loans.name: Porikaripo

texts.en:
Porikaripo is a hardworking married man, with five children ages 16, 14, 10, 8 and 4 living in Kamwenge, Uganda.  He carries out livestock farming, which he started with the intention of educating his children and also to improve his standards of living. He also earns additional income from crop farming. Despite of his challenges such as lack of capital and unfavorable weather, he hopes to be  a modernized farmer. 

He is requesting for a loan to buy more cows for fattening.

loans.use: to buy more cows for fattening.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a 54-year-old hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He carries out livestock farming, a business he started with the intention of educating his children. He earns additional income from crop farming. Godfrey hopes to expand his farm and become a renown model farmer. His main challenges are lack of capital and unfavorable weather conditions.

He is requesting a loan to add more cows to fatten on his farm.

loans.use: to add more cows to fatten on his farm.

loans.name: Fredy Alberto

texts.es:
Fredy es un carnicero con experiencia en manejo de carne y ganado desde hace 15 años, pero solo hasta hace 1 año fue que inicio con su propio negocio de carnicería en el municipio de Cocorna.

Hoy en día ha podido recoger una muy buena experiencia, y es por eso que desea inyectarle capital a su empresa para darle un impulso significativo que le permita obtener unos mejores recursos para disfrutarlos con su esposa y sus tres hijos menores.

Solicita un apoyo económico para realizar la compra de algunas cabezas de ganado para sacrificar y abastecer su negocio, también necesita realizar la compra de un enfriador para mejorar la presentación y calidad de su carne.

Con este préstamo podrá continuar sacando su negocio adelante y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposa y sus hijos.

Apoya a un trabajador colombiano con muchas ganas de progresar!
texts.en:
Fredy is a butcher with experience in handling meat and cattle for the past 15 years, but only a year ago he began his own butcher business in the municipality of Cocorna. 

These days he has been able to have a very good experience and it is for this that he wants to inject a some capital into his business to give it a significant boost which will permit him to get more income to enjoy it with his wife and their three young children. 

He asks for economic support to purchase some head of cattle to butcher and stock his business. He also needs to purchase a cooler to improve the presentation and quality of his meat.  

With this loan he will be able to continue getting his business ahead and will be able to improve the quality of life for his wife and their children.

Help a hard-working Colombian with a lot of desire to get ahead!

loans.use: to purchase some head of cattle and a cooler to stock his business and improve its presentation.

loans.name: Santos Sifredo

texts.es:
Santos de 32 años de edad, está casado y tiene dos hijos, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y se dedicó a trabajar desde muy pequeño.

Santos se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos, la actividades la aprendió de sus padres desde muy pequeño, él siembra maíz y ajonjolí, lo cual le sirve para garantizar el sustento de su familia. 


Él necesita el crédito para invertir en la siembra de ajonjolí, ya que es la época para sembrar y no le alcanzan sus recursos financieros para hacerlo.
Sus planes son sembrar una cantidad mas grande de ajonjolí para que su situación económica mejore.
texts.en:
Santos, 32 years old, is married and has two children. He didn't have the opportunity to go to school and began to work when he was very little.

Santos works growing basic grains, work he learned from his parents when he was very young. He plants corn and sesame, which serve to guarantee the sustenance of his family. 
 
He needs the loan to invest in planting sesame, since it is planting season and he doesn't have enough economic resources to do it. 

His plans are to plant a larger quantity of sesame so that his economic situation improves.

loans.use: to invest in sesame planting, since it is planting season and he doesn't have enough economic resources to do it.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana, a 28-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, resides in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her husband and three sons. Her husband has been running his own business selling shoes in the local market for many years. He is solely responsible for managing the household and fulfilling the needs of the entire family. 

Rukhsnan's husband wants to buy a variety of shoes from a shoe factory for resale purposes, but due to insufficient financial resources he is unable to. Therefore, Rukhsana is requesting a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan her husband can easily purchase the shoes.

Rukhsana is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of shoes for resale

loans.name: El Buen Samaritano Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “El Buen Samaritano” conformado por 09 socias optimistas. Esther de 43 años separada con 02 hijos dependientes. Hace más de 07 años que se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz. Así mismo como actividad secundaria se dedica a la crianza de animales como pollos. Su último crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de azúcar, fideos, aceite y harina. El deseo de Esther es de complementar su negocio con una librería. El grupo “El Buen Samaritano” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Esther se encuentra de pie, es la cuarta del lado derecho,  viste casaca rosada y lleva en brazo a su bebe.
texts.en:
This is The Good Samaritan group which is made up of nine optimistic members. 

Esther is 43 years old and is separated with two dependent children. Over seven years ago she began selling groceries such as rice. At the same time she also began raising animals such as chickens. 

The latest loan that Esther has applied for will be used to buy sugar, pasta, oil and flour. Esther would like to supplement her business with a bookstore. 

The Good Samaritan group is grateful to all the people that made this loan possible. 

Esther is standing and is the fourth person from the right. She is wearing a pink cardigan and is holding a baby in her arms.

loans.use: to buy sugar, pasta, oil and flour

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 66 years old and married with four children.

Leonora works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, noodles, detergent, soap, shampoo, beers, eggs, etc. to sell.

Leonora has borrowed and repaid her previous loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Leonora aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, noodles, detergent, soap, shampoo, beers, eggs, etc. to sell

loans.name: Estella

texts.en:
Estella is a widow who works hard to support her family. For the past nine years she has sold used clothing to make a living.

Estella has applied for a 28,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional bundles of used clothes. She is working to continue building up her business.

loans.use: to buy additional bundles of used clothing to sell

loans.name: Qurbonali

texts.ru: Курбонали выходец из городка Нурек. Он адвокат с высшим образованием. Ему 46 лет. Курбонали работает на двух работах. Он работает адвокатом по заявке. И еще у него имеется мастерская, где он предоставляет свои услуги по ремонту мотора машин. То есть Курбонали разносторонний человек. Он работает усердно, чтобы его семья ни в чем не нуждалась. Курбонали женат и у него четверо дочерей. Его дочерям по 20, 11, 6 и 4 года. Жена и старшая дочь занимаются швейным делом. Курбонали еще и финансово помогает своей старой матери и младшему брату. Его младший брат в этом году окончил гимназию, однако он до сих пор не получил аттестат о среднем образовании, так как он еще не оплатил за последний учебный год. Курбонали хочет помочь ему. Он запрашивает кредит в размере 1800 долларов США. Около 1500 долларов пойдут на оплату учебного договора, а на остальные он купит учебные принадлежности для брата. Его брат после получения аттестата хочет продолжить учебу и поступить в ВУЗ. Ваша поддержка очень необходима их семье.
texts.en: Qurbonali is 46 and an immigrant from the town of Nurek. He is a lawyer with a higher education and works two jobs. For one, he works as a lawyer; in addition, he has a workshop where he repairs vehicle engines. In other words, Qurbonali is a multifaceted person. He works diligently so that his family has everything they need. Qurbonali is married and has four daughters aged 20, 11, 6 and 4. His wife and oldest daughter work as seamstresses. He also helps his elderly mother and younger brother financially. His younger brother graduated from high school this year but hasn't yet received his high school diploma because he didn't pay for his last year of school. Qurbonali wants to help him and is requesting a loan of $1,800 USD, $1,500 of which will pay for the school fees; with the remainder, he is going to buy school supplies for his brother, who wants to go to university. Your support is very needed by their family.

loans.use: to pay his younger brother's annual school fees

loans.name: Samol

texts.en:
Samol is 40 years old and a married man with three dependent children. He lives in a community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He is a farmer on a small farm land which is located near his house. On his farm land he grows rice and sells the product to the local dealers and customers at the local market. So far, he has been involved in this career for nineteen years with an average income around USD 5.00 per day. 

Samol wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in his house now. Therefore, he is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine and buy its facilities. By doing this, he can help his family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. He is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Isa

texts.en:
Isa, 21, is married and lives in Misamis Occidental with her family. Her husband is a mechanic.

Isa sold grilled food in their village to earn a living. This venture was going well enough that after two years in the business she has now opened a sari-sari, or general store.

Previously, Isa had taken out and successfully repaid a loan through GDMPC used to support her grilling business. She is now receiving a 10,000 PHP loan to buy more groceries to sell in her sari-sari. With her profits she plans to repair her house in order to give her family a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en: Analiza owns and operates a retail business, selling assorted kinds of grocery goods in her village for a living. She has been engaged in this business for many years with her husband working on it also, and earns well from these activities. Her store is doing well and yet she needs financial assistance to improve it. Recently, she took a new loan to buy additional grocery goods to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Marichu

texts.en:
Marichu is a 52-year-old married woman. She has three children living with her. To earn her living she settled in Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Over the past five years, Marichu was able to put up a retail store that absolutely met the markets primary demands. Up until now, the business is doing well and is giving enough cash flow to cover the family's day-to-day expenditures. She added groceries in her store so she has gained more returns.

Marichu joined GDMPC earlier this year to have easy access to financial services. Her first loan application from the cooperative has been approved. The money taken is intended to obtain additional raw ingredients to prepare food to sell. With the acquisition of in-demand basic commodities, Marichu expects an increase in sales so as to expand her business and improve the general living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to obtain additional raw ingredients to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 66 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for nine years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods and other groceries. 

In the future Lucia would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is 62 years old, married, and has six children. She is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for  years now, and has borrowed in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Julia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feeds for her pigs. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feeds for her pigs.

loans.name: Norlyn

texts.en: Norlyn is 47 years old and married with five children.  With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. Norlyn has been in this business for eleven years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. In the future she would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Martin Antonio

texts.es:
Cada mañana tras haber ayudado a su esposa en los oficios del hogar, Martin sale con mucho ánimo y entusiasmo a su puesto de venta de electrodomésticos en el mercado central de su ciudad. Ordena su local e inicia a atender a su clientela, todos salen satisfechos por los productos y la atención de calidad que les brindan. Tiene 49 años, está casado y tiene  dos hijos. Hace seis años estableció su negocio, antes administraba junto a su papá y a su hermano otras tiendas, pero anhelaba tener algo propio. Lucho hasta conseguirlo y con un pequeño capital logró establecer su local, el que poco a poco ha ido incrementando. 
Martin solicita el crédito para aumentar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar planchas, licuadoras, tostadora, microondas, abanicos, equipos de sonido, mini refrigeradoras, entre otros electrodomésticos. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que anhela ganar más clientela y al mismo tiempo mejorar los ingresos, de manera que pueda  ofrecerles mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, salud y educación de calidad. Es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor, su familia es su fuente de motivación. Uno de sus planes futuros es llegar a tener una tienda más grande y poseer variedad de productos para satisfacer la demanda de su clientela.
texts.en:
Every morning, after having helped his wife with domestic chores, Martin leaves the house filled with enthusiasm as he takes his place in his business selling home appliances in the central market of his city. He tends to his clients and they are all satisfied with his products and services. He is 49 years old, married and has two children. Six years ago, he began his business, but before that he helped run a business alongside his father and his brother, but he dreamed of having one he could call his own. He fought long before he was able to obtain what he dreamed of and with a little investment money, he was able to open his own business which has been growing little by little. 
Martin is asking for a loan in order to increase his revenue production. He needs irons, blenders, toasters, microwaves, fans, sound systems, mini refrigerators and other home appliances. He has confidence that with the loan he will be able to attract more clientele and also earn more money so he can offer a better quality of life to his family as well as their health and education. He is a hard working and enterprising man and his family is his main source of motivation. One of his future plans is to have a bigger store and to have a wider variety of products to meet customer demand.

loans.use: purchase supplies for his home appliance store.

loans.name: Savath

texts.en:
Savath is 35 years old and a married woman with six children. Her husband is 41 and a motor taxi driver. Two of her children work, and three are in school. They all live in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Together, they can earn approximately 19 USD a day.

For the past two years Savath has woven flat bamboo baskets to sell. Now she is applying for a 1,000 USD loan through KREDIT to buy cattle to breed, then sell the calves.

Savath anticipates seeing this venture being profitable enough to send her children to university.

loans.use: to buy cattle to breed

loans.name: Togtokh

texts.en:
Mr. Togtokh, 42 years old, lives with his wife and four children in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. He is a driller at a mining company, and has worked there for seven years. His wife is currently staying at home, looking after their children. Using his previous loan, he has renovated his house and created a comfortable environment for his family. 

Now he is requesting a loan of 2,100,000 MNT to encase his house with bricks for extra insulation in order to drastically reduce coal usage for heating during the winter. Coal is the main contributor to air pollution in Mongolia, according to the state research department.

loans.use: to further insulate his house with bricks in order to drastically reduce coal usage.

loans.name: Segundina

texts.en:
Segundina is a 55-year-old married woman and a mother of four grown up children from Dulag, Leyte. Segundina runs a sari-sari or retail variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. This is the source of her income. Several months ago, a typhoon ruined her business, thus decreasing her income. As of this time, Segundina has just started to rebuild her store but she lacks capital to increase her stock. 

She is requesting a loan to buy additional stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, bread and biscuits, soap and toiletries, soda and beverages, cooking ingredients and seasonings. This loan could help Segundina make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, bread and biscuits, soap and toiletries, soda and beverages, cooking ingredients and seasonings.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita is married and has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She works hard to support her family. She has been in this business for 10 years now, and has requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more raw materials for weaving. In the future, Lolita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 50 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

She has borrowed and paid back 9 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 1 year and also earns an income from fish vending. Lourdes aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Safina

texts.en:
Safina is a responsible mother of two children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for 20 years. He is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. Her husband needs to maintain his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good. It requires more maintenance on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to maintain his taxi. Therefore, Safina has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Safina's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Safina also plans to save the profit from her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future.

Safina is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To pay for maintenance of her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Diana Constanza

texts.es:
Diana es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos brindándoles una educación de buena calidad. 

Diana es una madre muy responsable, y con su negocio ha tenido una gran fortaleza y ha podido salir adelante. 

Desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal como lociones y cremas de manos a través de catálogos a las personas de su barrio y algunos amigos.

Actualmente Diana tiene unos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital, busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a sus 2 hijos una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Diana is a hard working person and, thanks to her efforts, she has been able to give her two children a high quality education. 
Diana is a responsible mother and because of her business, she has had the need to be strong and has been able to get ahead in life. 
Some time ago, she began to sell personal products like lotions and hand creams to individuals in her neighborhood and to her friends. 
Currently, Diana has customer requests but because she lacks sufficient capital, she is looking for a loan in order to purchase supplies that will help her respond to customer demand. 
Her biggest dream is to move her business along and to be able to offer her children a high quality of life and a stable income.

loans.use: purchase supplies like lotions and hand cream.

loans.name: Yanjinsuren

texts.en: Yanjinsuren, 52 years old, lives with her granddaughter in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. She has retired from work and gets state pension. She used to work as a chemistry analyst for thirty-two years at a power station. Her son works in Korea on a labor contract and sends remuneration to her. She is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement and fiberglass for house renovation. After renovation, she and her granddaughter will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to buy building materials in order to renovate her house for less coal burning

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en:
Dinah is 36 years old and married with three children who are in school. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of items to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, shampoo, etc.

Dinah has been in this business for 10 years. In the future she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of items to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 14 years now.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like shampoo, eggs, canned goods, etc. In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like shampoo, eggs, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell coconut wine business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional gallons of coconut wine to sell.

Angelita has been in this business for 28 years now.

In the future, Angelita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional gallons of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Heydys Patricia

texts.es:
Heydys es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Sincelejo desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Heydys y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Heydys desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como maíz, papa, aceite, carne, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Heydys is a modest but hard working woman who has dedicated the majority of her life to raising her children. She lives in the municipality of Sincelejo where she has developed a spectacular skill for cooking and began her own business preparing foods to sell like tamales, chorizos, empanadas and more. 

She sells these food products in the neighborhood where she lives where everyone knows Heydys skill and know they can always buy delicious foods from her. 

Heydys desires to increase her sales and desire to work more comfortably and so she is asking for a loan in order to purchase supplies for cooking like corn, potatoes, oil, meat and more. 

This loan will help her to push her business ahead and to obtain the necessary income to continue supporting her family.

loans.use: purchase supplies like oil, corn and more.

loans.name: Eufrocina

texts.en:
Eufrocina is 45 years old and has six children, three of whom are in school. She is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for 20 years now and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional vitamins and feeds for her pigs. In the future, Eufrocina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional vitamins and feeds for her pigs.

loans.name: Celuk Rahayu Group

texts.en:
Several months have passed and Celuk Rahayu group was able to pay off its loan on time. In the journey of its business, the group members are progressing quite rapidly. They can raise pigs in a good way so that they get a satisfactory result. Because of this, some of the members of the group got enough money that they could save some. During this time their activities are monitored by the Loan Officer for their achievements and serve as an example for other farmers. 

Ni Nengah sold all of her piglets and earned enough profit after deducting other costs. From the profit she can fulfill her family's daily needs and save some. 

Because the prices of feed are high, the Celuk Rahayu group has requested a bigger loan. Each member gets 2,000,000 IDR. The loan will be used to buy high quality piglets and feed.

Ni Nengah will use the loan to buy 3 superior piglets and quality feed. To reduce costs, she still gives mixed feeds to her pigs. She hopes the pigs will grow healthy and not be attacked by disease. If she can save enough savings to venture her own capital, she will raise pigs with it.

Ni Nengah and all the members of the Celuk Rahayu send their greetings to all lenders, to Kiva and to MUK.

loans.use: to purchase 3 local piglets

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a married woman with five children. Lydia is 54 years old and has two children who are still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Lydia has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. Lydia requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her business.
